<article class="blog-archive-post post-31653 post type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-happenings post_format-post-format-aside 31653">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/31653/" title=""><img alt="John Eckman" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/jeckman-256x256.png" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/11/jeckman-512x512.png 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-john-eckman" title="Posts by John Eckman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> John Eckman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/31653/" title=""><time datetime="2023-06-22T13:05:35-04:00">June 22</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>On Monday, June 26th, I’ll be presenting at Boston’s WordPress Meetup on ways Artificial Intelligence (AI) can integrate with WordPress. The presentation, “You Got Your AI In My WP: WordPress and Artificial Intelligence”, will explore a few tools available that utilize AI to assist content creators on WordPress — including 10up’s own <a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a> and Jetpack’s <a href="https://jetpack.com/ai/">AI Assistant</a>.</p>
<p>The Boston WordPress Meetup is free to attend (registration required) and starts at 6:30 PM with a networking hour. If you’re in the Boston area, <a href="https://www.meetup.com/boston-wordpress-meetup/events/lwwwdtyfcjbjc/">sign up here</a> — I’d love to see you there.</p>
</div>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31588 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-projects introducing-headstartwp-an-open-source-nimble-framework-for-headless-wordpress-sites">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/introducing-headstartwp-an-open-source-nimble-framework-for-headless-wordpress-sites/">Introducing HeadstartWP: An Open Source, Nimble Framework for Headless WordPress Sites</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-taylor-lovett" title="Posts by Taylor Lovett" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/TLovett-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/TLovett-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Taylor Lovett</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/introducing-headstartwp-an-open-source-nimble-framework-for-headless-wordpress-sites/" title="Introducing HeadstartWP: An Open Source, Nimble Framework for Headless WordPress Sites"><time datetime="2023-06-15T08:15:27-04:00">June 15</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/introducing-headstartwp-an-open-source-nimble-framework-for-headless-wordpress-sites/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31603" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1200,h_675/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1.png" alt="" width="1200" height="675" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1.png 1200w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1-300x169.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1-800x450.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1-768x432.png 768w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1-1152x648.png 1152w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/06/image-1-576x324.png 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Drawing from lessons learned building and supporting dozens of headless sites for our clients, 10up architected <a href="http://headstartwp.10up.com/">HeadstartWP</a>: <strong>a jumping-off point for decoupled builds, powered by WordPress and Next.js. HeadstartWP delivers premium 10up craftsmanship with time-saving efficiencies for developers.</strong> In keeping with our commitment to giving back to the open web ecosystem, HeadstartWP is now available as a free and open source framework.</p>
<p>A light-weight, highly flexible, and extensible toolkit, HeadstartWP is everything a developer needs to start building a decoupled site using modern, broadly adopted technologies.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/introducing-headstartwp-an-open-source-nimble-framework-for-headless-wordpress-sites/#more-31588" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Introducing HeadstartWP: An Open Source, Nimble Framework for Headless WordPress Sites</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31402 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-projects classifai-turns-2-0-with-openai-integrations-and-content-generation-applications">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-turns-2-0-with-openai-integrations-and-content-generation-applications/">ClassifAI Turns 2.0, With OpenAI Integrations and Content Generation Applications</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-turns-2-0-with-openai-integrations-and-content-generation-applications/" title="ClassifAI Turns 2.0, With OpenAI Integrations and Content Generation Applications"><time datetime="2023-05-02T09:05:29-04:00">May 2</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31408" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_840,h_402/prod/uploads/2023/05/ClassifAI-2.0-Blog-2.png" alt="" width="840" height="402" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/05/ClassifAI-2.0-Blog-2.png 840w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/05/ClassifAI-2.0-Blog-2-300x144.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/05/ClassifAI-2.0-Blog-2-800x383.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/05/ClassifAI-2.0-Blog-2-768x368.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 840px) 100vw, 840px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>The latest <a href="https://github.com/10up/classifai/releases/tag/2.0.0">2.0 release of ClassifAI</a> — our open source plugin that utilizes artificial intelligence (AI) to augment content creation within WordPress — comes with OpenAI GPT and DALL·E integration, expanding the plugin’s capabilities in aiding editors.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-turns-2-0-with-openai-integrations-and-content-generation-applications/#more-31402" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on ClassifAI Turns 2.0, With OpenAI Integrations and Content Generation Applications</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31285 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web nineteen-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-2-release">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/nineteen-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-2-release/">Nineteen 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.2&nbsp;Release</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/nineteen-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-2-release/" title="Nineteen 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.2 Release"><time datetime="2023-04-07T07:18:06-04:00">April 7</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31291" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1024,h_683/prod/uploads/2023/04/inline-image-x2-1.png" alt="" width="1024" height="683" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/04/inline-image-x2-1.png 1024w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/04/inline-image-x2-1-300x200.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/04/inline-image-x2-1-800x534.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/04/inline-image-x2-1-768x512.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>On March 29, WordPress released its first major update of 2023, <strong><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2023/03/dolphy/">WordPress 6.2</a> (“Dolphy”)</strong>, with major improvements to the site editor experience. “Dolphy” also marks a shift in WordPress’ trajectory, with future releases emphasizing authoring workflows and collaborative experiences instead of theme-level customization.</p>
<p>Some major updates to the site editor experience and workflow include:</p>
<ul>
<li>A new sidebar experience that makes editing site navigation more efficient.</li>
<li>Block Settings are now split into settings and styles to make the UI easier to understand.</li>
<li>Add new blocks easier with drag and drop capabilities for media and a split view option so you can swiftly navigate categories and previews.</li>
<li>Search for free-use images on Openverse directly in the editor.</li>
<li>Write completely distraction-free by hiding panels and controls.</li>
<li>Copy and paste complete styles from one block to another.</li>
<li>Easily push style updates of a block to apply globally.</li>
</ul>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/nineteen-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-2-release/#more-31285" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Nineteen 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.2&nbsp;Release</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/wordpress-vip-names-10up-2022-partner-of-the-year/">WordPress VIP Names 10up 2022 Partner of the&nbsp;Year</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/wordpress-vip-names-10up-2022-partner-of-the-year/" title="WordPress VIP Names 10up 2022 Partner of the Year"><time datetime="2023-03-24T12:58:27-04:00">March 24</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31177" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_2048,h_1072/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image.png" alt="" width="2048" height="1072" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image.png 2048w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image-300x157.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image-800x419.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image-768x402.png 768w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/partner-of-the-year-featured-image-1536x804.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 2048px) 100vw, 2048px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>We are honored to be named <strong>WordPress VIP’s <a href="https://wpvip.com/2023/03/22/hats-off-to-10up-our-wordpress-vip-2022-partner-of-the-year/">2022 Partner of the Year</a></strong>. This past year continued over a decade of close collaboration and formal partnership between 10up and WordPress VIP – and our shared success is evidence of the strength of open platforms like WordPress in the enterprise.</p>
<blockquote><p>“As one of WordPress VIP’s longest-tenured partners, 10up understands the carefully-crafted architectures and strategies that drive success on the WordPress VIP platform. And how to deliver exceptional results for customers.” — WordPress VIP</p></blockquote>
<p>We look forward to another year — and decade — of building a better web alongside WordPress VIP.</p>
<p>If you’re interested in learning more about how we work alongside partners like WordPress VIP to build finely crafted websites and tools on open source platforms like WordPress, <a href="https://10up.com/contact/">reach out</a>! We can’t wait to hear from you.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31135 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web decode-2023-a-free-globally-virtual-wordpress-developer-conference">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/decode-2023-a-free-globally-virtual-wordpress-developer-conference/">DE{CODE} 2023: A Free, Globally Virtual WordPress Developer Conference</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/decode-2023-a-free-globally-virtual-wordpress-developer-conference/" title="DE{CODE} 2023: A Free, Globally Virtual WordPress Developer Conference"><time datetime="2023-03-16T11:28:58-04:00">March 16</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31141" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1024,h_512/prod/uploads/2023/03/7a.-When-is-it-worth-investing-in-block-centric-building-in-WordPress-1.jpg" alt="" width="1024" height="512" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/7a.-When-is-it-worth-investing-in-block-centric-building-in-WordPress-1.jpg 1024w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/7a.-When-is-it-worth-investing-in-block-centric-building-in-WordPress-1-300x150.jpg 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/7a.-When-is-it-worth-investing-in-block-centric-building-in-WordPress-1-800x400.jpg 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/7a.-When-is-it-worth-investing-in-block-centric-building-in-WordPress-1-768x384.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Next week, WP Engine’s <a href="https://events.wpengine.com/event/b1c1e30f-2c73-4abb-a609-52afaed68717/websitePage:289e81f7-3e30-49de-9510-696ad303d192">DE{CODE}</a> conference kicks off — the largest WordPress developer event with insightful sessions aimed to educate developers on ways to build smarter, faster, and more securely with WordPress.</p>
<p>I will be participating in a panel along with four other industry experts, titled <strong>When is it worth investing in block-centric building in WordPress?</strong> The Q&amp;A discussion explores when and how to best leverage WordPress’ Block Editor and Site Editor when building digital experiences.</p>
<p>The conference takes place on March 21 (Americas and APAC) and March 23 (EMEA) and is completely free to attend virtually. <a href="https://events.wpengine.com/event/b1c1e30f-2c73-4abb-a609-52afaed68717/websitePage:289e81f7-3e30-49de-9510-696ad303d192">Learn more and register now</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31096 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-projects classifai-expands-capabilities-using-ai-for-recommended-content-block">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-expands-capabilities-using-ai-for-recommended-content-block/">ClassifAI Expands Capabilities, Using AI for Recommended Content&nbsp;Block</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-expands-capabilities-using-ai-for-recommended-content-block/" title="ClassifAI Expands Capabilities, Using AI for Recommended Content Block"><time datetime="2023-03-14T11:35:21-04:00">March 14</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-31102" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1600,h_500/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4.png" alt="" width="1600" height="500" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4.png 1600w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4-300x94.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4-800x250.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4-768x240.png 768w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/03/image4-1536x480.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>The <a href="https://github.com/10up/classifai/releases/tag/1.8.0">latest 1.8 release of ClassifAI</a> incorporates an innovative Recommended Content Block feature — giving sites the ability to <strong>recommend related content to users through the use of artificial intelligence</strong> (AI).</p>
<p>Built by 10up’s Open Source Practice, <a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a> is a free WordPress plugin that augments sites, streamlines the editorial process, and increases audience engagement by utilizing AI and machine learning (ML). Since its launch, the plugin’s capabilities have grown to include automated content tagging and classification, AI-powered image tagging and descriptive alt text assignment, smart focal point cropping, and image / PDF optical character recognition (OCR).</p>
<p>The newly added Recommended Content Block recommends additional content to site visitors based on their behavior. For instance, after finishing an article or video, the Recommended Content Block will offer suggestions on what to read or watch next based on sitewide traffic history, encouraging the reader to extend their session by interacting with more content.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/classifai-expands-capabilities-using-ai-for-recommended-content-block/#more-31096" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on ClassifAI Expands Capabilities, Using AI for Recommended Content&nbsp;Block</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31030 post type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings 10up-turns-12">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/10up-turns-12/">10up Turns&nbsp;12</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/10up-turns-12/" title="10up Turns 12"><time datetime="2023-02-23T15:12:28-05:00">February 23</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="size-full wp-image-31036 aligncenter" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1600,h_560/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3.png" alt="" width="1600" height="560" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3.png 1600w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3-300x105.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3-800x280.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3-768x269.png 768w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/image3-1536x538.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>This February, 10up celebrates our twelfth anniversary — a year of team and revenue growth, innovation in our solutions, and continued contributions to the open web and greater community. Our work continued to be recognized around the web, earning 10up nods as <strong>WordPress VIP’s Inaugural Gold Partner of the Quarter and 2022 Partner of the Year,</strong> garnering another <strong>Webby Award</strong> for our work on <a href="https://www.democracydocket.com/">Democracy Docket</a>, and an <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/posts/carole-munroe_stories-from-hilton-activity-7013635495473618944-nVet?utm_source=share&amp;utm_medium=member_desktop">Innovation SABRE Award</a> for our work on <a href="https://stories.hilton.com/">Stories From Hilton</a>, among other recognitions. Our clients agreed: we’re honored to <strong>exceed a 70+ net promoter score (NPS)</strong> from our clients in both halves of 2022, the threshold of a “world-class” service partner.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/10up-turns-12/#more-31030" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Turns&nbsp;12</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-31015 post type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-happenings post_format-post-format-aside 31015">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/31015/" title=""><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/31015/" title=""><time datetime="2023-02-22T12:42:08-05:00">February 22</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>On Tuesday, February 28th, I’ll be participating in <a href="https://tpfxbayarea.splashthat.com/">TriNet’s PeopleForceX</a> panel in San Francisco alongside other Bay Area business leaders — TriNet CTO Jeff Hayward and COYUCHI President &amp; CEO Eileen Mockus. Together, we’ll explore the shift from reactive to proactive thinking around implementing technology in business, and how fast-paced digitalization can impact growth and innovation.</p>
<p>This in-person event, which includes the panel and networking, is free to attend. If you’re in the Bay Area, <a href="https://tpfxbayarea.splashthat.com/">sign up here</a> – I’d love to see you there.</p>
</div>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-30949 post type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings 10up-contributes-to-girls-who-code-all-star-code-and-trees-for-the-future">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/10up-contributes-to-girls-who-code-all-star-code-and-trees-for-the-future/">10up Contributes to Girls Who Code, All Star Code, and Trees For The&nbsp;Future</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-ajaka-roth" title="Posts by Ajaka Roth" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Ajaka-Roth_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/Ajaka-Roth_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Ajaka Roth</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2023/10up-contributes-to-girls-who-code-all-star-code-and-trees-for-the-future/" title="10up Contributes to Girls Who Code, All Star Code, and Trees For The Future"><time datetime="2023-02-21T07:36:15-05:00">February 21</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-30955" src="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill,w_1901,h_512/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog.png" alt="" width="1901" height="512" srcset="https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog.png 1901w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog-300x81.png 300w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog-800x215.png 800w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog-768x207.png 768w, https://res.cloudinary.com/tenup/image/upload/f_auto,c_fill/prod/uploads/2023/02/10up-Donations-Blog-1536x414.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1901px) 100vw, 1901px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Each year, 10up contributes thousands of hours to open source initiatives – including <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release/">WordPress core releases</a>, publicly documenting our <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-publicly-releases-its-gutenberg-best-practices/">Gutenberg</a> and <a href="https://10up.github.io/Engineering-Best-Practices/">Engineering Best Practices</a>, and <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/distributor-releases-user-experience-upgrades/">our own freely available plugins and solutions</a> – in an effort to build a better web.</p>
<p>As 2022 drew to a close, we also made a financial contribution to three organizations whose missions resonate with our commitment to giving back and making the web economy and community a better place, now and in the future. Specifically, we contributed <strong>$12,360</strong> to <a href="https://girlswhocode.com/">Girls Who Code</a>, <a href="https://allstarcode.org/">All Star Code</a> – two organizations committed to advancing diversity in digital engineering – and <a href="https://trees.org/">Trees for the Future</a>, who help to offset the carbon footprint that our computing generates.</p>
<p>If you’re interested in joining a team that makes the web — and the world — better, <a href="https://10up.com/careers/">we’re always hiring</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-30685 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-uncategorized celebrating-connectivity-this-holiday-season">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/celebrating-connectivity-this-holiday-season/">Celebrating Connectivity This Holiday Season</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/celebrating-connectivity-this-holiday-season/" title="Celebrating Connectivity This Holiday Season"><time datetime="2022-12-22T10:19:21-05:00">December 22, 2022</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/celebrating-connectivity-this-holiday-season/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-30691" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Holiday-Gif_Blog.gif" alt="" width="1400" height="500" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Having spent another year making the web better alongside our clients and partners, we’ll be disconnecting our screens and recharging our batteries so that we can bring our best, again, in 2023.</p>
<p>As we bring 2022 to a close, <strong>10up will shut down for the holidays on Friday, December 23, and reopen on Tuesday, January 3.</strong></p>
<p>With gratitude to the clients, friends, partners, and colleagues who made another successful year possible, we wish you a festive and relaxing season.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-30460 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release/">Twenty-six 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.1&nbsp;Release</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release/" title="Twenty-six 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.1 Release"><time datetime="2022-11-09T06:16:29-05:00">November 9, 2022</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="size-full wp-image-30466 aligncenter" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1.png" alt="" width="2048" height="1365" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1.png 2048w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1-300x200.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1-800x533.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1-768x512.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/11/WordPress-6.1-1536x1024.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 2048px) 100vw, 2048px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Released last week, <a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2022/11/misha/">WordPress 6.1</a> (“Misha”) primarily delivers enhancements to the full site building experience in the Block Editor. The 6.1 release introduces a new default theme, Twenty Twenty-Three, and a suite of performance and usability improvements:</p>
<ul>
<li>Introduction of new content templates that can accelerate page creation.</li>
<li>Block Template parts can now be defined in classic themes.</li>
<li>Performance improvements including caching `WP_Query` database queries, priming caches in `REST API` and multisite network options queries, as well as new Site Health checks for Persistent Object Cache and Page Cache.</li>
<li>Site Editor settings now sync across browsers and devices for each editor.</li>
<li>Improved ability to select partial paragraphs within a block.</li>
<li>The option to keep the list view of all blocks in a post on the left side as the default, as opposed to previously having to toggle it.</li>
</ul>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/twenty-six-10uppers-contribute-to-wordpress-6-1-release/#more-30460" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Twenty-six 10uppers Contribute to WordPress 6.1&nbsp;Release</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-30376 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web 10up-publicly-releases-its-gutenberg-best-practices">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-publicly-releases-its-gutenberg-best-practices/">10up publicly releases its Gutenberg Best Practices</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-fabian-kaegy" title="Posts by Fabian Kaegy" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/10up-Bio-Picture-Fabian-Kägy-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/10up-Bio-Picture-Fabian-Kägy-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Fabian Kaegy</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-publicly-releases-its-gutenberg-best-practices/" title="10up publicly releases its Gutenberg Best Practices"><time datetime="2022-10-13T12:04:54-04:00">October 13, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter wp-image-30382 size-full" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3.png" alt="" width="1600" height="800" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3-300x150.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3-800x400.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3-768x384.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/10/image3-1536x768.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>In keeping with our mission to make a better web, 10up strives to strengthen and <a href="https://10up.com/giving-back/">contribute back to</a> the open-source technology ecosystem we build upon. We contribute thousands of hours each year and open source innovations like <a href="https://www.elasticpress.io/">ElasticPress</a>, which integrates Elastic and WordPress; <a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a>, which brings AI and machine learning to WordPress; and <a href="https://distributorplugin.com/">Distributor</a>, which solves for cross-site content reuse. We also share our <a href="https://10up.github.io/Engineering-Best-Practices/">Engineering Best Practices</a> and <a href="https://10up.github.io/Open-Source-Best-Practices/">Open Source Best Practices</a> as public projects on GitHub.</p>
<p><strong>In that same spirit, we have now publicly opened up – and open <em>sourced</em> – our WordPress <a href="https://gutenberg.10up.com/">Gutenberg Best Practices</a> documentation.</strong></p>
<p>The <a href="https://gutenberg.10up.com/">Gutenberg Best Practices</a> project began as an internal onboarding and continuing education resource detailing the “10up Way” when it comes to the WordPress block editor and client editorial experience. In deciding to open up in beta as a public resource, our goal is to help developers learn about the WordPress block editor and extend it through the customization of core blocks and the carefully crafted development of custom blocks.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-publicly-releases-its-gutenberg-best-practices/#more-30376" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up publicly releases its Gutenberg Best Practices</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-29824 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings google-and-10up-invite-you-to-join-the-privacy-sandbox-community-group">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-and-10up-invite-you-to-join-the-privacy-sandbox-community-group/">Google and 10up Invite You To Join The Privacy Sandbox Community Group</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-mollie-pugh" title="Posts by Mollie Pugh" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/mollie-pugh-profile-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/mollie-pugh-profile-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Mollie Pugh</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-and-10up-invite-you-to-join-the-privacy-sandbox-community-group/" title="Google and 10up Invite You To Join The Privacy Sandbox Community Group"><time datetime="2022-06-30T06:30:24-04:00">June 30, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p>In 2019, Google announced its intention to phase out support for third-party cookies in Chrome–an effort <a href="https://privacysandbox.com/intl/en_us/open-web/#the-privacy-sandbox-timeline">now scheduled for completion</a> by late 2023.</p>
<p>Alongside this year’s edition of <a href="https://europe.wordcamp.org/2022/">WordCamp Europe</a> in Porto, Portugal, 10up, Google, and long-time 10up partner WP Engine hosted an inter-agency roundtable to explore how the upcoming changes will impact our clients and the web at large—laying the groundwork for the formation of a working group that provides feedback on all aspects of Google’s Privacy Sandbox Initiative.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-and-10up-invite-you-to-join-the-privacy-sandbox-community-group/#more-29824" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Google and 10up Invite You To Join The Privacy Sandbox Community Group</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-29735 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web wordpress-6-0">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-6-0/">WordPress 6.0 Released, Led By 10up Core Tech&nbsp;Lead</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-6-0/" title="WordPress 6.0 Released, Led By 10up Core Tech Lead"><time datetime="2022-06-03T07:30:30-04:00">June 3, 2022</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-6-0/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="alignnone size-full wp-image-29744" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1.jpg" alt="" width="1600" height="1085" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1-300x203.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1-800x543.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1-768x521.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/06/image1-1536x1042.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;">Last week saw the <a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2022/05/arturo/">release of WordPress 6.0</a> — a release that improves the block editor and full site editing experience through an upgraded user interface that simplifies page composition and content creation. <strong>Eleven 10uppers contributed to WordPress 6.0, with Senior Engineer Peter Wilson serving as Release Lead / Core Tech Lead, and myself credited as a Noteworthy Contributor.</strong></p>
<p>WordPress 6.0 boasts more than 50 <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2022/04/20/wordpress-6-0-accessibility-improvements/">block editor accessibility enhancements</a> alongside performance improvements that reduce the number of database queries WordPress makes on page requests, especially in the WordPress admin.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-6-0/#more-29735" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on WordPress 6.0 Released, Led By 10up Core Tech&nbsp;Lead</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-29369 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings category-projects 10up-wp-engine-launch-enginet">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-wp-engine-launch-enginet/">10up and WP Engine Partner to Launch Enginet: WP Engine’s WordPress-Powered Intranet</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/ruthrosengren/" title="Posts by Ruth Rosengren" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Ruth-Rosengren_avatar_1488328286-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2017/02/Ruth-Rosengren_avatar_1488328286-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Ruth Rosengren</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-wp-engine-launch-enginet/" title="10up and WP Engine Partner to Launch Enginet: WP Engine’s WordPress-Powered Intranet"><time datetime="2022-04-20T09:00:34-04:00">April 20, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-29474" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/wp-engine-intranet-example.jpg" alt="WP Engine Intranet Example" width="1247" height="770" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/04/wp-engine-intranet-example.jpg 1247w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/04/wp-engine-intranet-example-300x185.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/04/wp-engine-intranet-example-800x494.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/04/wp-engine-intranet-example-768x474.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1247px) 100vw, 1247px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Last year, 10up collaborated with one of its longtime platform partners, WP Engine, to conceptualize and implement Enginet – WP Engine’s new WordPress-powered intranet. With usability, utility, and brand harmony at the forefront, Enginet is the product of dozens of interviews and hundreds of survey responses representing a cross-section of WP Engine’s thousand-plus team.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-wp-engine-launch-enginet/#more-29369" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up and WP Engine Partner to Launch Enginet: WP Engine’s WordPress-Powered Intranet</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-29441 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings post_format-post-format-aside wordpress-vip-names-10up-q1s-top-gold-agency-partner">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-vip-names-10up-q1s-top-gold-agency-partner/" title="WordPress VIP Names 10up Q1’s Top Gold Agency Partner"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-vip-names-10up-q1s-top-gold-agency-partner/" title="WordPress VIP Names 10up Q1’s Top Gold Agency Partner"><time datetime="2022-04-12T14:04:46-04:00">April 12, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>Earlier today, <a href="https://wpvip.com/partner-awards/?utm_source=partner_10up">WordPress VIP announced their inaugural Partner Awards</a>: recognizing partners that distinguished themselves during 2022’s first quarter. <strong>We’re proud to be named WordPress VIP’s first Top Gold Agency Partner</strong>. In WordPress VIP’s words, “10up’s work continues to inspire new possibilities of what can be achieved on our platform.” You can learn more about our decade-long partnership in the <a href="https://wpvip.com/partner/10up/?utm_source=partner_10up">VIP Partner Directory</a>.</p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-29336 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings google-announces-end-of-life-for-universal-analytics">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-announces-end-of-life-for-universal-analytics/">Google Announces End-of-Life For Universal Analytics</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-patrick-ahl" title="Posts by Patrick Ahl" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Patrick-Ahl-Headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/05/Patrick-Ahl-Headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Patrick Ahl</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-announces-end-of-life-for-universal-analytics/" title="Google Announces End-of-Life For Universal Analytics"><time datetime="2022-03-28T10:00:02-04:00">March 28, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4.png" alt="Google Analytics 4" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-29342" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-1536x864.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-1152x648.png 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/03/google-analytics-4-576x324.png 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Earlier this month, Google announced the official <a href="https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/prepare-for-future-with-google-analytics-4/">end-of-life for Google Analytics 3: Universal Analytics</a> and rallied partners and customers to prepare to migrate to its successor, <a href="https://blog.google/products/marketingplatform/analytics/new-way-unify-app-and-website-measurement-google-analytics/">Google Analytics 4 (GA4)</a>.</p>
<p>To quote Google directly, “Universal Analytics was built for a generation of online measurement that was anchored in the desktop web, independent sessions, and more easily observable data from cookies.” Today, organizations engage online with audiences who consume content with multiple devices and across multiple channels, including apps and, sometimes, multiple websites.</p>
<p>Growing consumer privacy concerns and evolving data privacy regulations also require organizations to rethink how they track customer journeys. While Universal Analytics offers limited privacy settings, GA4 is designed with user privacy at its core, with an anonymized model for tracking user behavior (no longer storing IP addresses) and detailed country-level privacy controls. </p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/google-announces-end-of-life-for-universal-analytics/#more-29336" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Google Announces End-of-Life For Universal Analytics</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-29180 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-around-the-web post_format-post-format-aside wordpress-performance-lab-plugin-beta-release">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-performance-lab-plugin-beta-release/" title="WordPress Performance Lab Plugin Beta Release"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/SCM-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/01/SCM-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-simon-champion-macpherson" title="Posts by Simon Champion-MacPherson" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Simon Champion-MacPherson</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-performance-lab-plugin-beta-release/" title="WordPress Performance Lab Plugin Beta Release"><time datetime="2022-03-08T10:29:04-05:00">March 8, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Yesterday, the WordPress Performance team </span><a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2022/03/07/the-performance-lab-plugin-has-been-released/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">announced the first beta release</span></a><span style="font-weight: 400;"> of the “Performance Lab” plugin, a proving ground for future performance improvements built into WordPress. The plugin is guided by real-world scaling lessons from experts like Google, and includes contributions from six 10uppers. This first public release focuses on image optimization and bringing attention to suboptimal caching setup and excessive script use. You can download the plugin </span><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/performance-lab"><span style="font-weight: 400;">from WordPress.org</span></a><span style="font-weight: 400;">, </span><a href="https://github.com/WordPress/performance"><span style="font-weight: 400;">provide feedback on Github</span></a><span style="font-weight: 400;">, or dive into more detail in the </span><a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2022/03/07/the-performance-lab-plugin-has-been-released/"><span style="font-weight: 400;">announcement post</span></a><span style="font-weight: 400;">.</span></p>
</div>
</div>
</article>

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-turns-11/">10up Turns&nbsp;11</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-turns-11/" title="10up Turns 11"><time datetime="2022-02-28T17:30:52-05:00">February 28, 2022</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/10up-turns-11/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-29138" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary.png" alt="" width="1600" height="560" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary-300x105.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary-800x280.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary-768x269.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/10up-eleventh-anniversary-1536x538.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Last February, 10up <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10-years/">celebrated a milestone</a>: ten years. In the year since, we continued to significantly grow our team, build out our services, and invest in our company culture and open source initiatives – all while earning 7 recognitions in <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/seven-projects-recognized-in-webby-awards/">The 25th Annual Webby Awards</a> and <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/2021-microsoft-supplier-program-prestige-awards/">multiple Microsoft Supplier Program Prestige Awards nominations</a>.<br>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-29039 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings distributor-releases-user-experience-upgrades">

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/distributor-releases-user-experience-upgrades/">Distributor Releases Prioritize User Experience Upgrades And The Block Editing Experience</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/distributor-releases-user-experience-upgrades/" title="Distributor Releases Prioritize User Experience Upgrades And The Block Editing Experience"><time datetime="2022-02-21T11:05:18-05:00">February 21, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-29096" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1.png" alt="" width="1544" height="500" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1.png 1544w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1-300x97.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1-800x259.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1-768x249.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/banner-1544x500-1-1536x497.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1544px) 100vw, 1544px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Since its <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2018/distributor-wordpress-syndication-reuse/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">public launch in 2018</a>, we’ve seen universities and educational institutions, publishers and media organizations, government agencies, and established brands use <a href="https://distributorplugin.com/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Distributor</a> to leverage their content across multiple websites to enhance visibility, expand reach, and increase the ROI of content creation. We’ve also had the privilege of consulting with numerous clients to develop content syndication strategies and guidelines, optimize Distributor workflows, and even extend the plugin’s capabilities to solve unique content distribution and sharing needs.</p>
<p>Over the last year, Distributor has seen numerous improvements in performance, <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2019/significant-distributor-improvements/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">media syndication and content filtering</a>, and push/pull content management, as well as the addition of a <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/distributor-1-6-release/" target="_blank" rel="noopener">Setup Wizard</a> to streamline onboarding, Site Health Info integration, and additional developer hooks and documentation. <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/distributor-releases-user-experience-upgrades/#more-29039" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Distributor Releases Prioritize User Experience Upgrades And The Block Editing Experience</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-28976 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings publisher-media-kit">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/publisher-media-kit/">Create A Media Kit In Minutes With 10up’s Publisher Media Kit&nbsp;Plugin</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/publisher-media-kit/" title="Create A Media Kit In Minutes With 10up’s Publisher Media Kit Plugin"><time datetime="2022-02-07T11:00:49-05:00">February 7, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand.png" alt="Publisher Media Kit Plugin" width="1600" height="800" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-28982" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand-300x150.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand-800x400.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand-768x384.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/02/publisher-media-kit-plugin-brand-1536x768.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/publisher-media-kit/">Publisher Media Kit</a>, our latest free WordPress plugin release, helps publishers add a robust digital media kit to their websites, detailing traffic statistics, audience insights, and advertisement placements and rates. It’s the perfect solution for small to medium-size publishers who want to put their best digital foot forward to impress advertising partners and sponsors, without the cost and complexity of a fully bespoke solution.</p>
<p>Publisher Media Kit introduces new editor <a href="https://wordpress.org/patterns/">block patterns</a> to the WordPress editor inspired by common media kit content, like Cover, Audience Profiles, Stats, Packages, Why Buy Ads, and Questions/Contact. The Rates and Digital Ad Specs patterns use a new Tabs block (shipped with the plugin) that displays sections of content with brief headings in a compact, tab-navigated layout.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/publisher-media-kit/#more-28976" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Create A Media Kit In Minutes With 10up’s Publisher Media Kit&nbsp;Plugin</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-28931 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordpress-5-9">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-5-9/">Eleven 10uppers Recognized In WordPress 5.9&nbsp;Release</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-5-9/" title="Eleven 10uppers Recognized In WordPress 5.9 Release"><time datetime="2022-02-02T11:00:42-05:00">February 2, 2022</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-28937" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release.jpg" alt="WordPress 5.9 Release" width="1600" height="1085" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release-300x203.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release-800x543.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release-768x521.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2022/01/wordpress-5-9-release-1536x1042.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2022/01/josephine/">WordPress 5.9, released last week</a>, marks the first public release of WordPress’ long-anticipated full site editing functionality alongside other block editor enhancements.</p>
<p>Full site editing extends the block editor’s reach beyond the boundaries of a single page: empowering the customization and management of global elements like a site’s header, footer, and menus just like any other block. To enable and use the feature, a site’s existing theme must be adapted or a new theme that’s made for the feature, called a “block theme,” must be created. We’re excited by the opportunities full site editing introduces.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2022/wordpress-5-9/#more-28931" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Eleven 10uppers Recognized In WordPress 5.9&nbsp;Release</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-28592 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings classifai-ocr-scanning-for-pdfs">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/classifai-ocr-scanning-for-pdfs/">ClassifAI Expands OCR Scanning Capabilities To&nbsp;PDFs</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/classifai-ocr-scanning-for-pdfs/" title="ClassifAI Expands OCR Scanning Capabilities To PDFs"><time datetime="2021-11-16T12:30:53-05:00">November 16, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI.jpg" alt="ClassifAI" width="1920" height="1080" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-28598" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI.jpg 1920w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/11/classifAI-576x324.jpg 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1920px) 100vw, 1920px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>The recent <a href="https://github.com/10up/classifai/releases/tag/1.7.0">1.7 release of ClassifAI</a>, our free plugin that augments WordPress-powered websites with artificial intelligence and machine learning technology, expanded its Optical Character Recognition (OCR) scanning capabilities to support multi-page PDF files.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/classifai-ocr-scanning-for-pdfs/#more-28592" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on ClassifAI Expands OCR Scanning Capabilities To&nbsp;PDFs</span></a></p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-28151 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings new-wordpress-plugin-release-and-updates">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/new-wordpress-plugin-release-and-updates/">10up Releases New WordPress Plugin To Address Insecure Content, Updates Others</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/new-wordpress-plugin-release-and-updates/" title="10up Releases New WordPress Plugin To Address Insecure Content, Updates Others"><time datetime="2021-09-21T09:15:54-04:00">September 21, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/plugins.png" alt="Icons for 10up Plugins" width="1496" height="500" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-28163" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/plugins.png 1496w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/plugins-300x100.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/plugins-800x267.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/plugins-768x257.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1496px) 100vw, 1496px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>10up’s <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2019/open-source-practice/">Open Source Practice</a> has doubled down on contributing tools, time, and code to the WordPress community to empower developers and ensure longevity for the open-source platform that supports many of our largest clients — a platform that now powers more than 40% of all websites. In the last year, that meant investing 6,500+ hours across 30+ projects, which included updates to our flagship plugins like <a href="https://distributorplugin.com/">Distributor</a>, <a href="https://www.elasticpress.io/">ElasticPress</a>, and <a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a>, among other plugins, and several new WordPress plugin releases like <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/block-for-apple-maps-wordpress-plugin/">Block For Apple Maps</a>, <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/eight-day-week/">Eight Day Week</a>, and <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/convert-to-blocks/">Convert to Blocks</a>.</p>
<p>Today, we’re happy to announce the release of a new WordPress plugin, <strong>Insecure Content Warning</strong>, and share updates to several smaller popular plugins.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/new-wordpress-plugin-release-and-updates/#more-28151" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Releases New WordPress Plugin To Address Insecure Content, Updates Others</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-28010 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings appearances-fall-2021">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/appearances-fall-2021/">10up Appearances, Fall 2021&nbsp;Edition</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/appearances-fall-2021/" title="10up Appearances, Fall 2021 Edition"><time datetime="2021-09-13T12:00:26-04:00">September 13, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up.jpg" alt="Team 10up Speaking Appearances" width="1600" height="675" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-28025" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up-300x127.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up-800x338.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up-768x324.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/09/team-10up-1536x648.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>At 10up, we make a better web by finely crafting websites and tools for content creators. We also give back to our community of digital makers by encouraging team members to share their experience, insights, and lessons learned at industry events, and through engagement with online media. Here are some recent and upcoming highlights around the web:</p>
<h2>Torque Social Hour</h2>
<p>Our President &amp; Founder Jake Goldman kicked things off as a special guest on <a href="https://youtu.be/6Tnr_mJTAtU">The Torque Social Hour</a>, a weekly livestream about WordPress news, events, and life. The show spends a lot of time on headless WordPress solutions like WP Engine’s Atlas product and Jake discusses some newer 10up plugins and our ongoing contributions to the open source community. </p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/appearances-fall-2021/#more-28010" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Appearances, Fall 2021&nbsp;Edition</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27692 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordpress-5-8">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/wordpress-5-8/">WordPress 5.8 Released, Eight 10uppers Named As Contributors</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/wordpress-5-8/" title="WordPress 5.8 Released, Eight 10uppers Named As Contributors"><time datetime="2021-07-29T16:20:19-04:00">July 29, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum.jpg" alt="WordPress 5.8 Tatum" width="1600" height="1067" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-27698" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum-300x200.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum-800x534.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum-768x512.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/wordpress-5-8-tatum-1536x1024.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2021/07/tatum/">WordPress 5.8, released last Tuesday</a>, brings a variety of enhancements to the block editing experience and introduces Global Styles and Global Settings APIs.</p>
<p>Blocks have transformed the way pages and posts are built. <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2021/07/03/wordpress-5-8-field-guide/">WordPress 5.8 extends the power of blocks</a> to put even more control in the hands of site owners.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/wordpress-5-8/#more-27692" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on WordPress 5.8 Released, Eight 10uppers Named As Contributors</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27566 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings embracing-friday-culture">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/embracing-friday-culture/">Embracing Friday Culture To Build A Happy, Healthy, High-Performing Team</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/embracing-friday-culture/" title="Embracing Friday Culture To Build A Happy, Healthy, High-Performing Team"><time datetime="2021-07-07T14:11:42-04:00">July 7, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando.jpg" alt="Team 10up In Florida" width="1600" height="548" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-27578" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando-300x103.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando-800x274.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando-768x263.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/07/team-10up-orlando-1536x526.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>When I founded 10up, <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/adjusting-to-remote-work/">building a remote company at scale</a> was somewhat of a novelty. Our agency has been featured in case studies, <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Work-Together-Anywhere-Remotely-Successfully-Individuals-ebook/dp/B07C2TTZVG">books</a>, <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2019/remote-work-culture/">ebooks</a>, <a href="https://www.boye-co.com/blog/2019/7/1/how-to-make-remote-working-successful">interviews</a>, and <a href="https://www.comparably.com/articles/10-companies-with-fully-remote-workforces-that-are-hiring-now/">articles</a> about <a href="https://www.cnbc.com/2017/04/25/10-virtual-companies-offering-six-figure-salaries.html">remote work culture</a>, including a Forbes list of <a href="https://www.forbes.com/sites/laurashin/2016/03/31/at-these-125-companies-all-or-most-employees-work-remotely/#6e81772b6530">notable remote work companies</a>. I have guest lectured at universities like Stanford and the University of Michigan on the subject. Where we were once early pioneers of a new model, companies around the globe have come to embrace remote work.</p>
<p>Now, more than <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10-years/">10 years in</a>, we’re called to revisit how we think about remote work in the context of client service, continued pioneering of working models, and cultivating a happy, healthy, high-performing workplace.</p>
<p>For instance, one thing we’ve realized is that when you already work remotely or stay at home during time off, a day off doesn’t always feel like a day off. When your home and office are the same place, and “entering the office” is only few taps away on that computer in your pocket, finding a healthy work/life balance can be a challenge.</p>
<p>While evaluating potential improvements to the 10up workforce experience, we found ourselves asking, <em>“Client service is our number one value — can we make meaningful changes for our team without diminishing our customer experience?”</em></p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/embracing-friday-culture/#more-27566" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Embracing Friday Culture To Build A Happy, Healthy, High-Performing Team</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27503 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web decade-of-contributing-to-wordpress">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/decade-of-contributing-to-wordpress/">A Decade of Contributing to&nbsp;WordPress</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/helen/" title="Posts by Helen Hou-Sandi" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Helen Hou-Sandí" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/HHouSandi-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/HHouSandi-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Helen Hou-Sandi</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/decade-of-contributing-to-wordpress/" title="A Decade of Contributing to WordPress"><time datetime="2021-06-25T13:34:11-04:00">June 25, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-27509" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM.png" alt="WordPress Trac ticket #17887 with a date of 10 years ago" width="1630" height="850" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM.png 1630w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM-300x156.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM-800x417.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM-768x400.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/Screen-Shot-2021-06-24-at-7.31.54-AM-1536x801.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1630px) 100vw, 1630px" &nbsp;="" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Ten years ago today, <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2014/my-first-patch-helen/">I submitted my very first proposed change to WordPress itself</a> and not long after, in August of 2011, I joined 10up. I have been fortunate to be a part of and grow with the WordPress community in the decade since. Not only have I grown from Web Engineer to Director of Open Source Initiatives at 10up, but also in that time, I’ve gone from being a first-time contributor to <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/handbook/about/organization/#the-wordpress-core-team">one of a handful of WordPress lead&nbsp;developers</a>.</p>
<p>The power of open source and its communities continues to astound and humble me. I could never have dreamed this is where a little curiosity about <a href="https://wordpress.org/about/#bill-of-rights">the second freedom</a> to “study how the program works and change it to make it do what you wish” would lead… and I look forward to seeing what the next decade of my career brings with&nbsp;it.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27401 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings security-vulnerability-filebird-wordpress-plugin">
