<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/security-vulnerability-filebird-wordpress-plugin/">10up Uncovers Security Vulnerability in FileBird WordPress Plugin, Update Now&nbsp;Available</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/" title="Posts by " rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/?s=64&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/?s=128&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo avatar-default" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> </a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/security-vulnerability-filebird-wordpress-plugin/" title="10up Uncovers Security Vulnerability in FileBird WordPress Plugin, Update Now Available"><time datetime="2021-06-16T10:00:52-04:00">June 16, 2021</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/security-vulnerability-filebird-wordpress-plugin/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/filebird-wordpress-plugin.png" alt="FileBird WordPress Plugin" width="1150" height="500" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-27410" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/filebird-wordpress-plugin.png 1150w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/filebird-wordpress-plugin-300x130.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/filebird-wordpress-plugin-800x348.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/filebird-wordpress-plugin-768x334.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1150px) 100vw, 1150px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>As a leading contributor to WordPress, 10up is committed to the cultivation of a vibrant, collaborative, and healthy open-source ecosystem. We strive to strengthen open platforms and tools through responsible stewardship, and embrace the concept that “given enough eyeballs, all bugs are shallow.”</p>
<p><strong>Last week, that work included helping a popular WordPress plugin with 90,000+ installs fix a critical security vulnerability.</strong> </p>

<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/elasticpress-wpengine-ecommerce-hosting-plans/">WP Engine Includes ElasticPress.io In New eCommerce Hosting&nbsp;Plans</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-vasken-hauri" title="Posts by Vasken Hauri" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/VHauri-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/11/VHauri-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Vasken Hauri</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/elasticpress-wpengine-ecommerce-hosting-plans/" title="WP Engine Includes ElasticPress.io In New eCommerce Hosting Plans"><time datetime="2021-06-03T12:46:13-04:00">June 3, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p>WP Engine recently announced a new <a href="https://wpengine.com/ecommerce/">eCommerce solution for Small/Medium Businesses (SMBs)</a> seeking to launch a new <a href="https://woocommerce.com/">WooCommerce</a> store or scale up, optimize, and increase revenue for an existing online store.</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-27167" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine.png" alt="ElasticPress delivers Instant Search for WP Engine eCommerce Hosting Plans" width="1600" height="1160" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine-300x218.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine-800x580.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine-768x557.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/06/elasticpress-wp-engine-1536x1114.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><strong>The new solution offers an integration with <a href="http://elasticpress.io/">ElasticPress.io</a> — our fully integrated, end-to-end SaaS solution for adding the power of Elasticsearch to WordPress and WooCommerce.</strong></p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/elasticpress-wpengine-ecommerce-hosting-plans/#more-27161" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on WP Engine Includes ElasticPress.io In New eCommerce Hosting&nbsp;Plans</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27137 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-appearances post_format-post-format-aside click-deploy-and-global-maintainer-summit">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/click-deploy-and-global-maintainer-summit/" title="Helen Hou-Sandí Presents at Click/Deploy and the Global Maintainer Summit"><img alt="Helen Hou-Sandí" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/HHouSandi-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/HHouSandi-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/helen/" title="Posts by Helen Hou-Sandi" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Helen Hou-Sandi</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/click-deploy-and-global-maintainer-summit/" title="Helen Hou-Sandí Presents at Click/Deploy and the Global Maintainer Summit"><time datetime="2021-06-02T19:18:55-04:00">June 2, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>On Thursday, June 3 at 3:30pm EDT, I’ll be presenting “Editorial Experience: An Important Part of the Full Stack” at <a href="https://click-deployconf.ca/">Click/Deploy</a>, an event presented by Jamstack Toronto. If you’re intrigued by talk about Jamstack versus WordPress, this is for you. Then, on June 8 at 3:15 EDT I’m joining <a href="https://globalmaintainersummit.github.com/">GitHub’s Global Maintainer Summit</a> to present “You Can’t Have a Solution Without a Problem”. I’ll be talking about why I like to ask, “What’s the problem being solved for here?” and how that type of thought process can lead to better solutions.&nbsp;Both events are virtual and free to attend.</p>
</div>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-27104 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings 2021-microsoft-supplier-program-prestige-awards">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/2021-microsoft-supplier-program-prestige-awards/">10up Recognized In 2021 Microsoft Supplier Program (MSP) Prestige Awards</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-elena-bargo" title="Posts by Elena Bargo" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/08/bargo-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/08/bargo-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Elena Bargo</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/2021-microsoft-supplier-program-prestige-awards/" title="10up Recognized In 2021 Microsoft Supplier Program (MSP) Prestige Awards"><time datetime="2021-05-27T15:14:37-04:00">May 27, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><div class="fluid-width-video-wrapper" style="position: relative; width: 100%; padding-top: 56.3077%;"><iframe loading="lazy" title="10up Sizzle Reel: MSP Prestige Awards 2021" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/555864424.html" width="650" height="366" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen; picture-in-picture" allowfullscreen="" style="position: absolute; width: 100%; height: 100%; left: 0px; top: 0px;"></iframe></div></p>
<p>At 10up, we have enjoyed collaborative, multi-year partnerships with several different departments and teams at Microsoft, including the Microsoft Cloud Marketing team. Since 2017, 10up has successfully scaled the Cloud Blog’s platform to support 18+ blogs, several migrations, accessibility compliance, and strategic initiative projects with innovative and cost-effective technology solutions.</p>
<p>Each year, we build upon those strategic relationships to positively impact the Microsoft brand.</p>
<p><strong>This year we were honored to be nominated for three different supplier awards in the 2021 Microsoft Supplier Program Prestige Awards and named a finalist in one category.</strong></p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/2021-microsoft-supplier-program-prestige-awards/#more-27104" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Recognized In 2021 Microsoft Supplier Program (MSP) Prestige Awards</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-26861 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings seven-projects-recognized-in-webby-awards">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/seven-projects-recognized-in-webby-awards/">Seven 10up Projects Recognized In 25th Annual Webby&nbsp;Awards</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/seven-projects-recognized-in-webby-awards/" title="Seven 10up Projects Recognized In 25th Annual Webby Awards"><time datetime="2021-04-26T15:36:33-04:00">April 26, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards.png" alt="25th Annual Webby Awards" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26906" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-1536x864.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-1152x648.png 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/25th-annual-webby-awards-576x324.png 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>The Webby Awards honors excellence on the Internet. It is the most widely accepted industry award recognizing websites, online video and advertising, apps, Internet games, and podcasts. For its 25th year, a record-breaking 13,500 projects from around the world were entered into the competition.</p>
<p><strong>We were honored to discover that seven projects supported by 10up in 2020 have been recognized by The Webby Awards</strong> — including three listing 10up as the creator, and four others listing clients and partners.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/seven-projects-recognized-in-webby-awards/#more-26861" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Seven 10up Projects Recognized In 25th Annual Webby&nbsp;Awards</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-26734 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings core-web-vitals">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/core-web-vitals/">Core Web Vitals and Google’s Page Experience Ranking Signal</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-patrick-ahl" title="Posts by Patrick Ahl" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Patrick-Ahl-Headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/05/Patrick-Ahl-Headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Patrick Ahl</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/core-web-vitals/" title="Core Web Vitals and Google’s Page Experience Ranking Signal"><time datetime="2021-04-19T12:15:08-04:00">April 19, 2021</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/core-web-vitals/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p>A significant Google search algorithm update coming this June incorporates new performance metrics: <a href="https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2020/11/timing-for-page-experience">Core Web Vitals</a>. A new set of ranking signals based around page experience combines Core Web Vitals with existing signals such as <a href="https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2015/02/finding-more-mobile-friendly-search">mobile-friendliness</a>, <a href="https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/09/more-safe-browsing-help-for-webmasters">safe-browsing</a>, <a href="https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/11/heres-to-more-https-on-web">HTTPS-security</a>, and <a href="https://developers.google.com/search/blog/2016/08/helping-users-easily-access-content-on">intrusive interstitial guidelines</a> to provide a holistic picture of the quality of a user’s experience on a web page.</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26815" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/google-core-web-vitals.png" alt="Google Core Web Vitals" width="1208" height="846" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/google-core-web-vitals.png 1208w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/google-core-web-vitals-300x210.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/google-core-web-vitals-800x560.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/04/google-core-web-vitals-768x538.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1208px) 100vw, 1208px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Google tends to be guarded when it comes to big algorithm updates and how those changes impact search engine results and page rankings. This time, the search giant has provided explicit insight into what’s coming and how site owners and digital agencies can prepare.</p>
<p><a href="https://web.dev/vitals/#core-web-vitals">Core Web Vitals</a> were introduced by Google less than a year ago to measure real-world web page user experiences and provide guidance for delivering a great experience. While Google captures many data points that speak to site performance and considers <a href="https://backlinko.com/google-ranking-factors">hundreds of ranking factors</a> in its algorithm, the Core Web Vitals this update will focus on are:</p>
<ol>
<li style="margin-bottom: 14px;"><a href="https://web.dev/lcp/">Largest Contentful Paint (LCP)</a>: Measures perceived load speed — the time from clicking a link to seeing the majority of the on-screen content.</li>
<li style="margin-bottom: 14px;"><a href="https://web.dev/fid/">First Input Delay (FID)</a>: Measures responsiveness and interactivity — the time “long” tasks delay a visitor’s ability to interact with a page.</li>
<li><a href="https://web.dev/cls/">Cumulative Layout Shift (CLS)</a>: Measures visual stability — the unexpected movement of page elements due to lengthy load time or ad insertions that hinder user interaction and experience.</li>
</ol>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/core-web-vitals/#more-26734" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Core Web Vitals and Google’s Page Experience Ranking Signal</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-26587 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-appearances helen-hou-sandi-presents-at-the-github-virtual-meetup-for-open-source-fridays">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/helen-hou-sandi-presents-at-the-github-virtual-meetup-for-open-source-fridays/">Helen Hou-Sandí Presents at the GitHub Virtual Meetup for Open Source Fridays</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/helen/" title="Posts by Helen Hou-Sandi" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Helen Hou-Sandí" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/HHouSandi-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/HHouSandi-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Helen Hou-Sandi</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/helen-hou-sandi-presents-at-the-github-virtual-meetup-for-open-source-fridays/" title="Helen Hou-Sandí Presents at the GitHub Virtual Meetup for Open Source Fridays"><time datetime="2021-04-01T11:45:19-04:00">April 1, 2021</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/helen-hou-sandi-presents-at-the-github-virtual-meetup-for-open-source-fridays/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26593" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp.png" alt="Working with WordPress GitHub Meetup" width="1119" height="630" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp.png 1119w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/gh_meetup_wp-576x324.png 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1119px) 100vw, 1119px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>On Friday, April 2 at 10AM PDT/1PM EDT I’ll be joining Brian Douglas on <a href="https://www.twitch.tv/github">GitHub’s Twitch stream</a> for a <a href="https://www.meetup.com/github-virtual-meetup/events/277130728/">GitHub Virtual Meetup Open Source Friday</a>. Open Source Friday is a place for maintainers to share demos, stories, and inspiration with other GitHub users.</p>
<p>We’ll talk about using GitHub Actions to solve common problems in the WordPress development ecosystem, such as with 10up’s <a href="https://github.com/10up/action-wordpress-plugin-deploy">WordPress Plugin Deploy Action</a>, and how the WordPress project itself uses GitHub Actions.</p>
<p>This Meetup event is free and will also be available afterward on the <a href="https://www.youtube.com/github">GitHub YouTube channel</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/optimize-search-for-wordpress-ecommerce-stores/">How To Optimize Search For A WordPress Ecommerce Store</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-vasken-hauri" title="Posts by Vasken Hauri" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/VHauri-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/11/VHauri-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Vasken Hauri</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/optimize-search-for-wordpress-ecommerce-stores/" title="How To Optimize Search For A WordPress Ecommerce Store"><time datetime="2021-03-29T11:45:52-04:00">March 29, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search.jpg" alt="Optimize Ecommerce Search" width="1600" height="837" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26545" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search-300x157.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search-800x419.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search-768x402.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/optimize-ecommerce-search-1536x804.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>On Wednesday, March 31, I’ll be joining the team at WP Engine to deliver a free webinar titled <a href="https://hs.wpengine.com/webinar-optimize-search-wordpress-ecomm?utm_medium=referral&amp;utm_source=10up&amp;utm_campaign=global_b2c_ecomm">How to Optimize Search for Your WordPress Ecommerce Store</a>. </p>
<p>We’ll show <strong>how analytics can be used to create dynamic search results that boost sales</strong> and <strong>how modern search tooling can set up an online store to scale smoothly as the business grows</strong>. We’ll also highlight some ecommerce stores that are “doing it right” — like an apparel company that saw an 18% increase using the techniques this webinar covers.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/optimize-search-for-wordpress-ecommerce-stores/#more-26539" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on How To Optimize Search For A WordPress Ecommerce Store</span></a></p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-26512 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings convert-to-blocks">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/convert-to-blocks/">10up Releases Convert to Blocks to Support Safe Migrations to The WordPress Block&nbsp;Editor</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-darshan-sawardekar" title="Posts by Darshan Sawardekar" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/darshan-bw-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/darshan-bw-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Darshan Sawardekar</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/convert-to-blocks/" title="10up Releases Convert to Blocks to Support Safe Migrations to The WordPress Block Editor"><time datetime="2021-03-25T14:12:28-04:00">March 25, 2021</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/convert-to-blocks/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin.png" alt="Convert To Blocks Plugin" width="1544" height="500" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26518" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin.png 1544w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin-300x97.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin-800x259.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin-768x249.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/convert-to-blocks-plugin-1536x497.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1544px) 100vw, 1544px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><strong><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/convert-to-blocks/">Convert to Blocks</a> is a new WordPress plugin that automatically converts existing classic content to blocks when a page or post needs to be edited.</strong></p>
<p>The plugin works upon activation, with no configuration needed and does nothing until an editor needs to update or edit an existing piece of content. If a page or post is not already formatted using blocks when the editor is opened, Convert to Blocks automatically maps the content to the relevant blocks that come with WordPress. This approach ensures that existing and older content is preserved as-is until modified, which reduces the risk of unknowingly breaking a page or post content.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/convert-to-blocks/#more-26512" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Releases Convert to Blocks to Support Safe Migrations to The WordPress Block&nbsp;Editor</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-26455 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings eight-day-week">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/eight-day-week/">10up Relaunches Eight Day Week, Rolls Out Dedicated Microsite</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/eight-day-week/" title="10up Relaunches Eight Day Week, Rolls Out Dedicated Microsite"><time datetime="2021-03-23T12:05:48-04:00">March 23, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin.jpg" alt="Eight Day Week Plugin" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26461" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/eight-day-week-plugin-576x324.jpg 576w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><strong>We recently relaunched Eight Day Week, our free, open-source plugin that adds web-to-print workflow capabilities to WordPress.</strong> As part of the relaunch, we rolled out a <a href="https://eightdayweekplugin.com/">new microsite</a> to help explain the plugin. </p>
<p>With no settings or configurations to set up, the plugin empowers publishers to:</p>
<ul>
<li style="margin-bottom:14px;">Design individual print publications by organizing WordPress Posts into Print Issues. Within print issues, editors can create sections, arrange articles, and manage each article’s status.</li>
<li style="margin-bottom:14px;">Manage access for print production staff with new print users roles isolated to access and CMS capabilities relevant to their job — e.g. creating and managing issues, viewing issue information, and exporting for final production.</li>
<li style="margin-bottom:24px;">Export the print issue as an XML package that can be imported into Adobe InDesign for final page layout and print production.</li>
</ul>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/eight-day-week/#more-26455" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Relaunches Eight Day Week, Rolls Out Dedicated Microsite</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/plugin-madness-2021/">Two 10up Plugins Compete In Plugin Madness&nbsp;2021</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/plugin-madness-2021/" title="Two 10up Plugins Compete In Plugin Madness 2021"><time datetime="2021-03-19T13:14:08-04:00">March 19, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/plugin-madness-2021.jpg" alt="Plugin Madness 2021" width="1162" height="500" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26451" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/plugin-madness-2021.jpg 1162w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/plugin-madness-2021-300x129.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/plugin-madness-2021-800x344.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/plugin-madness-2021-768x330.jpg 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1162px) 100vw, 1162px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Two of 10up’s open-source solutions are vying for your votes in <a href="https://torquemag.io/2021/03/voting-for-torques-2021-plugin-madness-now-open/">Torque Magazine’s 2021 Plugin Madness</a> competition: <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/safe-redirect-manager/">Safe Redirect Manager</a> and <a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/elasticpress/">ElasticPress</a>.</p>
<p>In its sixth year, this bracket-style competition pits the best WordPress plugins against each other. This year, more than 300 plugins were nominated and narrowed to just 64 competitors. <a href="https://torquemag.io/pluginmadness/">Voting is open now</a> and everyone is invited to weigh-in.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-26391 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordpress-5-7">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/wordpress-5-7/">WordPress 5.7&nbsp;Released</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/wordpress-5-7/" title="WordPress 5.7 Released"><time datetime="2021-03-11T19:32:41-05:00">March 11, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2021/03/esperanza/">WordPress 5.7 was released</a> this week, bringing with it a refined block editor UI, lazy-loading iframes, streamlined migration from HTTP to HTTPS, standardized colors in the WordPress Admin, and a new Robots API and media search engine visibility setting.</p>
<blockquote><p><strong>FunFact:</strong> WordPress 5.7 is named for <a href="https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Esperanza_Spalding">Esperanza Spalding</a>, a modern musical prodigy. This is only the second time a WordPress namesake has been a living jazz musician.</p></blockquote>
<p>Nine 10uppers helped make this release possible, including myself, who was recognized as a Noteworthy Contributor. Thank you for helping make WordPress: Helen Hou-Sandí, Fabian Kaegy, Felipe Elia, John Watkins, Lukas Pawlik, Pete Nelson, Ramon Ahnert, and Stephanie Walters.</p>
</div>
</article>

</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26316" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/decode-2021.png" alt="DECODE 2021" width="1024" height="512" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/decode-2021.png 1024w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/decode-2021-300x150.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/decode-2021-800x400.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/03/decode-2021-768x384.png 768w" sizes="(max-width: 1024px) 100vw, 1024px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>

Created by one of our preferred WordPress hosting partners, <a href="https://wpengine.com/">WP Engine</a>, the conference focuses on leveraging WordPress to build faster, run smoother projects, and optimize for speed, growth, and search.</p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-26139 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings 10-years">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10-years/">10 Years And&nbsp;Up</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10-years/" title="10 Years And Up"><time datetime="2021-02-26T11:40:47-05:00">February 26, 2021</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary.jpg" alt="10up 10 Year Anniversary" width="1600" height="560" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-26277" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary-300x105.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary-800x280.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary-768x269.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/10-year-anniversary-1536x538.jpg 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><strong>This February, 10up celebrates its 10th anniversary.</strong> That’s ten years since I sat down alone in a small home office in Rhode Island, and decided I was ready to start this business.</p>
<p>According to the U.S. Bureau of Labor Statistics, only 30% of businesses reach the 10-year mark. It’s a milestone that has us looking back at our journey from a company of one to a team of more than 230 talented specialists, and looking ahead to the next 10 years.</p>
<p>To kick start some of this reflection, we asked the team if anyone wanted to share what 10up means to them today. Here are just a few clips from those who volunteered to record their thoughts.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10-years/#more-26139" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10 Years And&nbsp;Up</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25740 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings 10up-helps-launch-a-new-whitehouse-gov">

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10up-helps-launch-a-new-whitehouse-gov/">10up helps launch a new WhiteHouse.gov</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10up-helps-launch-a-new-whitehouse-gov/" title="10up helps launch a new WhiteHouse.gov"><time datetime="2021-02-04T14:38:25-05:00">February 4, 2021</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10up-helps-launch-a-new-whitehouse-gov/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign.png" alt="New White House Website Redesign" width="1600" height="880" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-25746" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign-300x165.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign-800x440.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign-768x422.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2021/02/biden-white-house-website-redesign-1536x845.png 1536w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>This past month, the White House re-launched its website, once again, powered by WordPress. To quote <a href="https://www.fastcompany.com/90596638/under-trump-whitehouse-gov-was-a-disaster-bidens-team-revamped-it-in-6-weeks">Fast Company</a>, <em>“Biden’s team revamped it in 6 weeks… an unprecedented feat for a government website.”</em> 10up was highlighted in the article as the development partner supporting the new <a href="https://www.whitehouse.gov/">WhiteHouse.gov</a>.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2021/10up-helps-launch-a-new-whitehouse-gov/#more-25740" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up helps launch a new WhiteHouse.gov</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25419 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordpress-5-6">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-6/">WordPress 5.6 Released, Led by 10up’s Helen Hou-Sandi</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-6/" title="WordPress 5.6 Released, Led by 10up’s Helen Hou-Sandi"><time datetime="2020-12-11T15:46:57-05:00">December 11, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone.jpg" alt="10up Contributors For WordPress 5.6 Simone" width="1200" height="675" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-25425" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone.jpg 1200w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/12/wordpress-5-6-simone-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" &nbsp;="" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2020/12/simone/">WordPress 5.6, released on Tuesday</a>, features expanded auto-update capabilities, further updates to jQuery, the initial groundwork for <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/11/23/wordpress-and-php-8-0/">PHP 8 support</a>, and REST API authentication with Application Passwords to help third-party apps connect with sites securely and help site owners see what connected apps are&nbsp;doing.</p>
<p>It also delivers new <a href="https://ithemes.com/wordpress-block-patterns-ultimate-guide/">block patterns</a> available in all default themes and a brand-new default theme built for the block editor. <a href="https://wordpress.org/themes/twentytwentyone/">Twenty Twenty-One</a> prioritizes accessibility, conforming to the <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/themes/handbook/review/accessibility/">WordPress accessibility-ready guidelines</a> and addressing several specialized standards from the <a href="https://www.w3.org/WAI/WCAG2AAA-Conformance">Web Content Accessibility Guidelines (WCAG) 2.1 at level&nbsp;AAA</a>.</p>
<p>This release, with an all-women and non-binary release squad, was led by <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad/">10up’s own Director of Open Source Initiatives Helen Hou-Sandì</a> as Core Tech Lead. Nine other 10uppers helped make this release possible, including myself, who along with Helen, was recognized as a Noteworthy Contributor. Thank you for helping make WordPress: Asvin Balloo, Darin Kotter, Evan Mullins, Fabian Kaegy, Felipe Elia, Helen Hou-Sandí, Jeffrey Paul, Junaid Bhura, Ryan Welcher, and Tung&nbsp;Du!</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25269 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings elasticpress-search-term-highlighting-synonym-dashboard">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/elasticpress-search-term-highlighting-synonym-dashboard/">Search Term Highlighting, New Synonym Dashboard introduced in ElasticPress 3.5</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-vasken-hauri" title="Posts by Vasken Hauri" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/VHauri-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/11/VHauri-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Vasken Hauri</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/elasticpress-search-term-highlighting-synonym-dashboard/" title="Search Term Highlighting, New Synonym Dashboard introduced in ElasticPress 3.5"><time datetime="2020-11-16T12:01:19-05:00">November 16, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><strong>ElasticPress 3.5 delivers two new features that uplevel onsite search capabilities and improve user experience: a synonym dashboard and search term result highlighting.</strong></p>
<p>This release follows several smaller updates that introduced a sticky post filter that displays specified posts atop search results, improved support for searching terms (like tags), a related posts block for the WordPress block editor, and a widget for filtering WooCommerce results by price.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/elasticpress-search-term-highlighting-synonym-dashboard/#more-25269" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Search Term Highlighting, New Synonym Dashboard introduced in ElasticPress 3.5</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25200 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings classifai-adds-image-ocr">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-adds-image-ocr/">ClassifAI Adds Image OCR, Easing Facebook And Instagram Embeds</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-adds-image-ocr/" title="ClassifAI Adds Image OCR, Easing Facebook And Instagram Embeds"><time datetime="2020-11-10T13:33:27-05:00">November 10, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a> — our free, open-source plugin that augments WordPress-powered websites with Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning technology — is taking another step forward in support of content creators and digital publishers. Our newest release, ClassifAI 1.6, integrates <strong>Optical Character Recognition (OCR) scanning of screenshots and other imagery</strong>.</p>
<p>ClassifAI 1.6 launches on the heels of <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/09/22/facebook-and-instagram-embeds-to-be-deprecated-october-24th/">Facebook and Instagram dropping support for open embeds</a>, which prevents platforms like WordPress from easily displaying original social posts by dropping a link into the editor. The OCR technology in ClassifAI 1.6 arrives at an opportune moment, making it easier to display social media posts on a WordPress site without compromising accessibility.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-adds-image-ocr/#more-25200" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on ClassifAI Adds Image OCR, Easing Facebook And Instagram Embeds</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25137 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web design-shopping-exercise">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/design-shopping-exercise/">10up’s New Design Shopping Exercise Featured On Smashing Magazine</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/kellyschummer/" title="Posts by Kelly Schummer" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Kelly-Schummer-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2015/09/Kelly-Schummer-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Kelly Schummer</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/design-shopping-exercise/" title="10up’s New Design Shopping Exercise Featured On Smashing Magazine"><time datetime="2020-10-30T13:48:24-04:00">October 30, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise.png" alt="Design Shopping Exercise" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-25143" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-1536x864.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-220x124.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-1152x648.png 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-576x324.png 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/design-shopping-exercise-160x90.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Working with large stakeholder groups can present challenges when working to reach a unified consensus on the design vision for a project. To encourage collaboration and ensure everyone feels confident and comfortable sharing ideas and opinions without judgment, 10up uses an exercise called Design Shopping.</p>
<p>In my recent article <a href="https://www.smashingmagazine.com/2020/10/design-shopping-workflow-showcase/">Design Shopping: Get A Faster Client Buy-In Through A Guided Design Showcase</a>, published by <em>Smashing Magazine</em>, I explain our Design Shopping workflow and how it was used to gain client buy-in and facilitate swift design decisions when redesigning the <a href="http://dmv.ca.gov/">California DMV website</a>.</p>
<p>Design Shopping helps stakeholder groups quickly align around a shared design vocabulary and foundational design principles in a deliberate, meaningful way by removing the pressure of being right or wrong. When done right, this exercise turns big picture possibilities into a tangible design direction.</p>
<p>If you’d like your next design and UX project driven by a creative team that prioritizes collaboration, clear communication, and caring client services, <a href="https://10up.com/contact/">get in touch</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-25098 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings 10up-frontity-partnership">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/10up-frontity-partnership/">10up formalizes partnership with&nbsp;Frontity</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-taylor-lovett" title="Posts by Taylor Lovett" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/TLovett-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/TLovett-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Taylor Lovett</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/10up-frontity-partnership/" title="10up formalizes partnership with Frontity"><time datetime="2020-10-22T13:11:04-04:00">October 22, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-25104" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02.png" alt="10up + Frontity Partnership" width="1600" height="900" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-1536x864.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-220x124.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-1152x648.png 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-576x324.png 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/10up-frontity-partnership-02-160x90.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>At 10up, we are always looking for innovative solutions that help us make a better web while adding value for our clients. Today, we are delighted to announce a <a href="https://frontity.org/partner/10up/">partnership</a> with <a href="https://frontity.org/">Frontity</a> — a next-generation JavaScript framework for creating headless WordPress experiences.</p>
<p>Using WordPress as a headless CMS empowers website owners to benefit from the superior editing experience WordPress is known for while also delivering the advantages of a decoupled front-end. Those advantages include the performant, app-like consumer experience popularized by frameworks like React.js.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/10up-frontity-partnership/#more-25098" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up formalizes partnership with&nbsp;Frontity</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24966 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings using-research-to-define-audiences">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/using-research-to-define-audiences/">Avoid Assumptions: Using Research To Define Audiences In Their Own&nbsp;Words</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-amy-grace-wells" title="Posts by Amy Grace Wells" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/amy.6-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/10/amy.6-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Amy Grace Wells</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/using-research-to-define-audiences/" title="Avoid Assumptions: Using Research To Define Audiences In Their Own Words"><time datetime="2020-10-12T12:51:00-04:00">October 12, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells.jpg" alt="Amy Grace Wells" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24972" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/amy-grace-wells-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>We hear about audiences from stakeholders. We learn about audiences from analytics, demographics, and surveys. But hearing their feelings, hopes for your product, and motivations is an invaluable tool in shaping content, calls to action, and platform strategies. By exploring audiences in-depth, you can better, and more accurately, define segments.</p>
<p>On October 15, 2020, in partnership with GatherContent, I am presenting the webinar, <a href="https://gathercontent.com/events/avoid-assumptions-using-research-to-define-audiences-in-their-own-words">Avoid assumptions: Using research to define audiences in their own words</a>.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/using-research-to-define-audiences/#more-24966" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Avoid Assumptions: Using Research To Define Audiences In Their Own&nbsp;Words</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24942 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin/">Increase ad impressions with 10up’s Ad Refresh Control plugin for&nbsp;WordPress</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/katiewilkerson/" title="Posts by Katie Wilkerson" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/katie-wilkerson-bw-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/katie-wilkerson-bw-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Katie Wilkerson</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin/" title="Increase ad impressions with 10up’s Ad Refresh Control plugin for WordPress"><time datetime="2020-10-08T12:35:33-04:00">October 8, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin.png" alt="Ad Refresh Control WordPress Plugin" width="2560" height="1280" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24948" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin.png 2560w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-300x150.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-800x400.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-768x384.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-1536x768.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-2048x1024.png 2048w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-220x110.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/10/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin-160x80.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 2560px) 100vw, 2560px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Over the past year, in partnership with <a href="https://newsinitiative.withgoogle.com/">Google News Initiative</a> (GNI), 10up has been working with hyperlocal publishers like <a href="https://newsinitiative.withgoogle.com/assets/static/docs/2019_GN_CaseStudy_LongBeachPost_final.pdf">Long Beach Post</a>, <a href="https://vtdigger.org/">VT Digger</a>, <a href="https://oilcity.news/">Oil City News</a>, and <a href="https://www.bkreader.com/">BK Reader</a> to drive digital strategies for audience and revenue growth.</p>
<p>One strategy — refreshing ad slots after a set amount of time — successfully leveraged existing web traffic to increase ad impressions. This revenue-boosting strategy typically requires an ad-savvy web engineer for implementation.</p>
<h2>Ad Refresh Control for WordPress</h2>
<p>In keeping with the vision of <a href="https://adrevenuelab.10up.com/">our GNI partnership</a> — providing widely applicable solutions that are relatively easy to implement — <strong>10up created Ad Refresh Control, a free, open source, WordPress plugin that empowers publishers to easily control the refreshing of ads</strong>.</p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/ad-refresh-control/">Ad Refresh Control</a> works immediately upon activation, enabling active view refresh for Google Ad Manager ad units without needing to modify any code. Active view refresh helps publishers recoup lost impressions by reloading a visible ad unit after a set amount of time.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ad-refresh-control-wordpress-plugin/#more-24942" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Increase ad impressions with 10up’s Ad Refresh Control plugin for&nbsp;WordPress</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24927 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-around-the-web post_format-post-format-aside onboarding-strategies-to-retain-remote-workers">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/onboarding-strategies-to-retain-remote-workers/" title="Onboarding Strategies To Retain Remote Workers"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Christina_Siegler-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2015/01/Christina_Siegler.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">

</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>This Thursday, I’m speaking alongside experts from Automattic and MeetEdgar in a panel discussion aimed at improving the onboarding of new remote workers so they feel connected to their team, aligned with company culture, and confident in expectations, communication, and corporate structure. The panel, <a href="https://workfromhomeconf.com/summit/agenda/day-one/945-am%E2%80%931030-am-pdt">Creating a Great Remote Hire Experience — Onboarding Strategies to Ensure Retention</a>, is part of the WFH Virtual Conference happening October 8-9, 2020.</p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-24852 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-happenings distributor-1-6-release">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/distributor-1-6-release/">Distributor 1.6 Introduces New Setup Wizard, Improved Tooling, and Official Hook Documentation</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/distributor-1-6-release/" title="Distributor 1.6 Introduces New Setup Wizard, Improved Tooling, and Official Hook Documentation"><time datetime="2020-09-17T12:15:05-04:00">September 17, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/distributor-1-6-release/#comments" class="comments-count">8 Comments</a>
</p>
<p><a href="https://distributorplugin.com/">Distributor</a> is our free WordPress plugin that empowers content managers to safely reuse and syndicate content across websites within a <a href="https://wordpress.org/support/article/create-a-network/">WordPress multisite network</a> or across the web using the <a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/rest-api/">REST API</a>. Designed with an intuitive user experience, Distributor integrates both “push” and “pull” use cases for sharing content and media between sites.</p>
<p>The <a href="https://github.com/10up/distributor/releases/tag/1.6.0">release of Distributor 1.6</a> — with <strong>a new setup wizard, improved push/pull management, clearer warnings to facilitate swift troubleshooting when issues arise, and Site Health Info integration, as well as added developer hooks</strong> — exemplifies our continued investment in making the plugin easier to use and empowering developers to tailor it to fit even the most complicated workflows.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/distributor-1-6-release/#more-24852" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Distributor 1.6 Introduces New Setup Wizard, Improved Tooling, and Official Hook Documentation</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24805 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings role-of-open-source-short-film">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/role-of-open-source-short-film/">The Role Of Open Source: A New make|Shift Documentary Short&nbsp;Film</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/role-of-open-source-short-film/" title="The Role Of Open Source: A New make|Shift Documentary Short Film"><time datetime="2020-09-03T12:40:03-04:00">September 3, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights.jpg" alt="Ben Ilfeld, Jake Goldman, Phil Crumm" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24811" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/09/make-shift-open-source-insights-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Earlier this year, the feature length <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/makeshift-documentary/">make|SHIFT</a> documentary explored the history of modern advertising and the role open-source technology played in its evolution. The film highlights the brands, makers, and agencies — including 10up — who harness new technology, test new business models, and question the status quo in an age that gives consumers the power to determine how, when, and where they connect with brands.</p>
<p>A <a href="https://youtu.be/Q0bN8CAmsUQ">new make|SHIFT short film</a>, clocking in at just under four minutes, highlights the critical role open source plays in creating the complex experiences consumers demand and features insights from myself, 10up’s President and founder Jake Goldman, and our CEO John Eckman.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/role-of-open-source-short-film/#more-24805" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on The Role Of Open Source: A New make|Shift Documentary Short&nbsp;Film</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24583 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad/">Helen Hou-Sandi Announced as Core Tech Lead for WordPress 5.6 All-Women Release&nbsp;Squad</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad/" title="Helen Hou-Sandi Announced as Core Tech Lead for WordPress 5.6 All-Women Release Squad"><time datetime="2020-08-31T12:00:58-04:00">August 31, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi.jpg" alt="Helen Hou-Sandi speaking at WordCamp Europe" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24589" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/helen-hou-sandi-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Aiming to increase the number of women involved in leading and regularly contributing to WordPress releases, earlier this year WordPress Executive Director Josepha Haden shared an official stretch goal of an <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/03/11/all-women-release-squad/">all-women release squad</a>. A May update on the <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/05/29/2020-wordpress-release-squads/">2020 release squads</a> confirmed the realization of that goal for the WordPress 5.6 release. </p>
<p>With <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-5-release/">WordPress 5.5 released</a>, the <a href="https://make.wordpress.org/core/2020/08/13/wordpress-5-6-release-planning/">WordPress 5.6 planning announcement</a> officially <strong>introduced the women leading the release, including 10up’s own Director of Open Source Initiatives Helen Hou-Sandì who will serve as Core Tech Lead</strong>.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-core-tech-lead-wordpress-5-6-all-women-squad/#more-24583" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Helen Hou-Sandi Announced as Core Tech Lead for WordPress 5.6 All-Women Release&nbsp;Squad</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-24559 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings post_format-post-format-aside remote-team-insights">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/remote-team-insights/" title="Sharing Insights On Remote Teams"><img alt="John Eckman" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/jeckman-256x256.png" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/11/jeckman-512x512.png 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-john-eckman" title="Posts by John Eckman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> John Eckman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/remote-team-insights/" title="Sharing Insights On Remote Teams"><time datetime="2020-08-25T12:00:39-04:00">August 25, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/remote-team-insights/#comments" class="comments-count">2 Comments</a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>This Thursday I’m participating in the <a href="https://echai.network/CoRise">CoRise Summit</a> — a free global startup summit to CoLearn, Collaborate, and CoRise with the community. As a panelist in a session on Building Remote Teams and Company Culture (August 27 at 12:30 PM ET), I’m looking forward to sharing some of our insights on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/adjusting-to-remote-work/">building and managing a distributed team</a>.</p>
<p>I’m also happy to be a contributor to <a href="https://www.amazon.com/Remote-Teams-Work-Handbook-Successful-ebook/dp/B08FMRG8P7/">Remote Teams Work</a>. It’s a new book out this month that provides strategic and practical guidance on establishing and running a successful remote team, including tools and methodologies, hiring and salaries, and creating a remote culture.</p>
<p>As more and more companies adjust to remote work and the value of distributed teams, hopefully they can benefit from the best practices we’ve seen and experienced. </p>
</div>
</div>
