<article class="blog-archive-post post-24451 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordpress-5-5-release">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-5-release/">WordPress 5.5 Released, Block For Apple Maps Included In Block&nbsp;Library</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-5-release/" title="WordPress 5.5 Released, Block For Apple Maps Included In Block Library"><time datetime="2020-08-18T12:00:14-04:00">August 18, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-5-release/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory.png" alt="Block for Apple Maps in the Block Directory" width="1400" height="630" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24457" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory.png 1400w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory-300x135.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory-800x360.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory-768x346.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory-220x99.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/block-for-apple-maps-block-directory-160x72.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1400px) 100vw, 1400px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/news/2020/08/wordpress-5-5-eckstine/">WordPress 5.5 was released</a> last week, featuring automatic updates for plugins and themes, lazy-loading images, extensible XML sitemaps, improvements to the block editor, and as always, supplemental under the hood security, performance, and developer improvements. As always, many 10uppers contributed to this release.</p>
<p>This latest release introduces a number of improvements to the block content editor. Highlights include inline image editing that lets you crop, rotate, and zoom photos within image blocks; device previews that show how content will appear to visitors with different screen sizes; and a Block Directory that lets you find, install, and insert third-party blocks in the editor, without ever leaving the page.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordpress-5-5-release/#more-24451" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on WordPress 5.5 Released, Block For Apple Maps Included In Block&nbsp;Library</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24397 type-post status-publish format-standard has-post-thumbnail hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings gni-ad-revenue-lab-workshop-series">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/gni-ad-revenue-lab-workshop-series/">GNI Ad Revenue Lab Presents Free Workshop Series For Local News Publishers</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/mikebal/" title="Posts by Mike Bal" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Mike-Bal-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2015/01/Mike-Bal-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Mike Bal</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/gni-ad-revenue-lab-workshop-series/" title="GNI Ad Revenue Lab Presents Free Workshop Series For Local News Publishers"><time datetime="2020-08-12T12:00:23-04:00">August 12, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24403" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series.jpg" alt="GNI Live Workshop Attendees" width="1600" height="900" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/gni-ad-revenue-lab-free-workshop-series-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Tomorrow, August 13, 2020, 10up kicks off a <a href="https://publishersonair.withgoogle.com/events/gni-revenue-lab">free, four-part workshop series</a> covering lessons and tactics used in the GNI Ad Revenue Lab to accelerate participating publishers’ advertising revenue.</p>
<p>The GNI Ad Revenue Lab, which kicked off in September 2019, is a <a href="https://newsinitiative.withgoogle.com/">Google News Initiative</a> project conducted in partnership with <a href="https://www.lionpublishers.com/">LION Publishers</a> and <a href="https://10up.com/">10up</a> to establish a web-based revenue optimization blueprint local news publishers can use as a reference point for website improvements.</p>
<p>As part of the Ad Revenue Lab, we have been working with seven hyperlocal U.S. publishers, like <a href="https://newsinitiative.withgoogle.com/assets/static/docs/2019_GN_CaseStudy_LongBeachPost_final.pdf">Long Beach Post</a>, to provide and measure reader revenue-focused digital strategies, often testing new tactics. From ad viewability and fill rate optimization to article markup and sitemaps to Google AMP and the optimization of ads, images, and page speed, we’ve documented our findings and are now sharing them more widely.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/gni-ad-revenue-lab-workshop-series/#more-24397" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on GNI Ad Revenue Lab Presents Free Workshop Series For Local News Publishers</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24361 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner/">ClassifAI Named A WordPress VIP Technology Partner</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner/" title="ClassifAI Named A WordPress VIP Technology Partner"><time datetime="2020-08-10T12:10:15-04:00">August 10, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner.png" alt="ClassifAI WordPress VIP Technology Partner" width="1600" height="560" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24367" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner-300x105.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner-800x280.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner-768x269.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner-1536x538.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner-220x77.png 220w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>As a leading contributor to WordPress and one of WordPress VIP’s longest-tenured Gold Agency Partners, 10up understands the carefully-crafted architectures and strategies that drive success on the VIP platform. </p>
<p><strong>Today we are delighted to share that ClassifAI has been named a WordPress VIP technology partner. ClassifAI is our free plugin that leverages leading cloud-based services, like IBM Watson and Microsoft Azure AI, to augment WordPress-powered websites with artificial intelligence and machine learning technology.</strong></p>
<p><a href="https://wpvip.com/partners/technology-partners/">WordPress VIP technology partners</a> support enterprise customers using WordPress at scale by forging significant technology integrations for personalization, business intelligence, digital asset management, and, with the addition of <a href="https://wpvip.com/partner/classifai/">ClassifAI</a>, artificial intelligence and machine learning.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/classifai-wordpress-vip-technology-partner/#more-24361" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on ClassifAI Named A WordPress VIP Technology Partner</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24337 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web design-spectrum-exercise">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/design-spectrum-exercise/">Gain Project Alignment with 10up’s Design Spectrum Exercise</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-lea-alcantara" title="Posts by Lea Alcantara" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/web_lea_full-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/08/web_lea_full-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Lea Alcantara</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/design-spectrum-exercise/" title="Gain Project Alignment with 10up’s Design Spectrum Exercise"><time datetime="2020-08-05T12:15:45-04:00">August 5, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise.png" alt="Design Spectrum Exercise" width="1600" height="700" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24343" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-300x131.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-800x350.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-768x336.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-1536x672.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-220x96.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/08/design-spectrum-exercise-160x70.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Effectively articulating a brand’s design aesthetic can be challenging for even the most savvy marketers. How do we take statements like “make it pop” and turn them into a more specific, shared design vision without frustrating revisions?</p>
<p>In my recent article, <a href="https://xd.adobe.com/ideas/perspectives/leadership-insights/make-it-pop-design-spectrum-exercise/">A Design Spectrum Exercise for Navigating ‘Make it Pop’ Client Requests</a>, published on the Adobe XD Ideas blog, I share a tool — the Design Spectrum exercise — we use at 10up with government, higher-ed, and Fortune 500 teams to gain creative alignment, build trust, reduce revision requests, and earn faster design approvals.</p>
<p>A Design Spectrum exercise shapes intangible concepts in an approachable way that cuts through ambiguity and identifies client design preferences and taste. This creates a framework of shared understanding that establishes the foundation for a smooth design process.</p>
<p>If you’d like your next design and UX project driven by a creative team that prioritizes collaboration, clear communication, and caring client services, <a href="https://10up.com/contact/">get in touch</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-24280 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wpcampus-2020">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wpcampus-2020/">Bolstering Higher Education and WordPress at WPCampus&nbsp;2020</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-john-eckman" title="Posts by John Eckman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="John Eckman" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/jeckman-64x64.png" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/11/jeckman-128x128.png 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> John Eckman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wpcampus-2020/" title="Bolstering Higher Education and WordPress at WPCampus 2020"><time datetime="2020-07-29T10:36:39-04:00">July 29, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020.png" alt="WPCampus 2020" width="1600" height="900" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24292" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-300x169.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-800x450.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-768x432.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-1536x864.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-220x124.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-1152x648.png 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-576x324.png 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/07/wpcampus-2020-160x90.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>With a growing portfolio of clients and partnerships in higher education, we are once again thrilled to <a href="https://2020.wpcampus.org/sponsor/10up/">sponsor</a> and participate in <a href="https://2019.wpcampus.org/">WPCampus</a>, furthering the confluence of WordPress in academia. This year’s two-day remote conference kicks-off today, July 29, 2020; registration is free.</p>
<h2>Presentations</h2>
<p>On the schedule, you’ll find two 10uppers delivering presentations:</p>
<p><strong>End to End Accessibility Testing</strong></p>
<p>Traditionally, testing interaction has been a largely manual process because out-of-the-box automation testing tools can’t open menus, check ARIA states, click around, or test general UI and movement. Because of this, as sites age, they can quickly fall out of compliance and become slowly inaccessible. </p>
<p>In this session, Tim Wright, Director of Front End Engineering will discuss <a href="https://2020.wpcampus.org/schedule/end-to-end-accessibility-testing/">end to end accessibility testing</a>. Learn how to create a long term accessibility roadmap and turn manual testing processes into lightweight automated scripts that can keep an eye on your project for years to come.</p>
<p><strong>AI 101: How Artificial Intelligence Can Help Educators Publish More, Faster, And Better</strong></p>
<p>Artificial intelligence isn’t just for self-driving cars and science fiction. Learn how easy-to-integrate solutions can help educators publish more effective content, promote accessibility, and keep visitors engaged. In this special sponsor presentation, Phil Crumm, Vice President, New Client Strategy, will help educators, technical leaders, content creators, and marketers understand how <a href="https://2020.wpcampus.org/schedule/ai-101-artificial-intelligence/">machine learning and artificial intelligence</a> can simplify content creation, accelerate authorship, and eliminate painful manual tasks. </p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wpcampus-2020/#more-24280" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Bolstering Higher Education and WordPress at WPCampus&nbsp;2020</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23992 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings block-for-apple-maps-wordpress-plugin">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/block-for-apple-maps-wordpress-plugin/">Block for Apple Maps: Our Latest Free, Open-Source WordPress Plugin</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/block-for-apple-maps-wordpress-plugin/" title="Block for Apple Maps: Our Latest Free, Open-Source WordPress Plugin"><time datetime="2020-06-26T14:21:35-04:00">June 26, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/apple-maps-gutenberg-block.png" alt="Apple Maps Gutenberg Block" width="1280" height="640" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-24001" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block.png 1280w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block-300x150.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block-800x400.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block-768x384.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block-220x110.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/apple-maps-gutenberg-block-160x80.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1280px) 100vw, 1280px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p><a href="https://wordpress.org/plugins/maps-block-apple/">Block for Apple Maps</a> is our latest free WordPress plugin that enables site owners to easily create, configure, and display embedded Apple Maps on web pages and posts. The plugin adds a new Apple Maps block to the WordPress block editor, also known as Gutenberg. </p>
<p>We’ve been tinkering with embedded Apple Maps since Apple announced the <a href="https://developer.apple.com/videos/play/wwdc2018/212/">MapKit JS API</a> in 2018. Following some major improvements to their Maps service, and with some clients interested in evaluating alternatives to other popular solutions (for reasons ranging from API pricing to privacy policies), we thought we’d use Apple’s annual WWDC conference this week as an excuse to finish up our work and bring our Block for Apple Maps plugin to life.</p>
<p><strong>With Block for Apple Maps, site owners can embed a responsive Apple Maps component on any page or post that uses the WordPress block editor.</strong></p>
<p>The block offers several customization options, including:</p>
<ul>
<li>Changing the map’s center point by looking up a location</li>
<li>Adding markers to annotate specific point of interests</li>
<li>Selecting the satellite, hybrid, standard, or muted standard map type</li>
<li>Showing or hiding controls, including the compass, zoom, and rotation</li>
<li>Setting the map height</li>
</ul>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/block-for-apple-maps-wordpress-plugin/#more-23992" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Block for Apple Maps: Our Latest Free, Open-Source WordPress Plugin</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23965 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-happenings post_format-post-format-aside retain-team-culture-distance">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/retain-team-culture-distance/" title="Build and Retain Team Culture at a Distance"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/tim-h-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2017/05/tim-h-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/timhoang/" title="Posts by Tim Hoang" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Tim Hoang</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/retain-team-culture-distance/" title="Build and Retain Team Culture at a Distance"><time datetime="2020-06-23T13:22:26-04:00">June 23, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>Recently, Director of Client Delivery for 10up Europe, Lily Bonney, and I co-hosted a webinar on <a href="https://www.onezeero.com/en/onezeero-blog/how-to-build-and-retain-team-culture-remotely">recruiting, onboarding, and maintaining company culture at a distance</a> with Onezeero, a UK-based tech recruitment partner. As organizations increasingly recognize the benefits of working from home, many are asking, “How do we still maintain our ‘essence’ at a distance?” From transparency during hiring to clear systems, processes, and company values, we’ve learned how to attract, onboard, and grow remote talent. Lily and I shared how 10up fosters meaningful connections and cultivates a vibrant team culture.</p>
</div>
</div>
</article>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-23758 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings statement-on-racial-injustice">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/statement-on-racial-injustice/">10up Statement on Racial Injustice</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-john-eckman" title="Posts by John Eckman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="John Eckman" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/jeckman-64x64.png" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/11/jeckman-128x128.png 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> John Eckman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/statement-on-racial-injustice/" title="10up Statement on Racial Injustice"><time datetime="2020-06-05T12:00:46-04:00">June 5, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/statement-on-racial-injustice/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23764" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural.jpg" alt="George Floyd Mural" width="1600" height="900" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-300x169.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-800x450.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-768x432.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-1536x864.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-220x124.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-1152x648.jpg 1152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-576x324.jpg 576w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/06/george-floyd-mural-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p style="font-size: 14px; text-align: center;"><em>George Floyd mural outside Cup Foods at Chicago Ave and E 38th St in Minneapolis, Minnesota. Mural by Xena Goldman, Cadex Herrera, and Greta McLain, assisted by Niko Alexander and Pablo Hernandez. Photo by <a href="https://www.flickr.com/photos/number7cloud/">Lorie Shaull</a> under CC BY-SA license.</em></p>
<p>Last week saw yet another incident in a long and tragic history of police and other violence against Black Americans in the killing of George Floyd in Minneapolis. This comes on the heels of a series of similarly senseless and devastating deaths across the country — Ahmaud Arbery in Brunswick, Georgia and Breonna Taylor in Louisville, Kentucky, among a painfully longer list of names. In the aftermath, we’ve seen an outpouring of support and outrage, through worldwide, large-scale protests.</p>
<p><strong>We are heartbroken</strong>, witnessing both the continued legacy of racial and structural inequality and the ensuing violence and property destruction that further hurts communities already reeling from the pandemic.</p>
<p>As a company, we want to be clear that <strong>we are opposed to police brutality and violence</strong>. Further, <strong>we are opposed to discrimination in all its forms</strong>. This specifically includes discrimination on the basis of race, ethnicity, or national origin, but also gender identity &amp; expression, sexual orientation, marital status, religion, and age.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/statement-on-racial-injustice/#more-23758" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Statement on Racial Injustice</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23713 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings makeshift-documentary">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/makeshift-documentary/">Catch 10up’s President and CEO in make|SHIFT, A Documentary Highlighting How Creative Technology Transformed Advertising</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/christinegarrison/" title="Posts by Christine Garrison" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a54756b4e907df4d47a780bfc76c5a36?s=64&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a54756b4e907df4d47a780bfc76c5a36?s=128&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Christine Garrison</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/makeshift-documentary/" title="Catch 10up’s President and CEO in make|SHIFT, A Documentary Highlighting How Creative Technology Transformed Advertising"><time datetime="2020-05-27T12:00:24-04:00">May 27, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/makeSHIFT.jpg" alt="make|SHIFT" width="1200" height="628" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23719" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT.jpg 1200w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT-300x157.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT-800x419.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT-768x402.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT-220x115.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/makeSHIFT-160x84.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1200px) 100vw, 1200px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>make|SHIFT explores the history of modern advertising and the role that creative technology played in its evolution. </p>
<p>The full-length documentary, produced by WP Engine, highlights the makers, agencies, and brands who had the courage to harness new technology, test new business models, and question the status quo. It professes to “feature more than 40 of the top marketing and tech minds in the industry, from developers and designers to creative directors to founders at some of the most innovative agencies in the world” — including 10up. </p>
<p>Our president and founder Jake Goldman and CEO John Eckman are both featured in the film, which will be released on Thursday, May 28 during Ad Age’s <a href="https://adagepublisherspanel-0528.splashthat.com/">Publisher’s Panel</a> and streamed live at <a href="https://makeshift.film/">makeshift.film</a>.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/makeshift-documentary/#more-23713" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Catch 10up’s President and CEO in make|SHIFT, A Documentary Highlighting How Creative Technology Transformed Advertising</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23683 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings wordsesh-americas-2020">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordsesh-americas-2020/">Helen Hou-Sandi Presents At WordSesh Americas&nbsp;2020</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/helen/" title="Posts by Helen Hou-Sandi" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Helen Hou-Sandí" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/HHouSandi-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/HHouSandi-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Helen Hou-Sandi</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/wordsesh-americas-2020/" title="Helen Hou-Sandi Presents At WordSesh Americas 2020"><time datetime="2020-05-26T12:23:30-04:00">May 26, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi.jpg" alt="Helen Hou-Sandi WordSesh Americas 2020" width="1760" height="880" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23689" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi.jpg 1760w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-300x150.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-800x400.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-768x384.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-1536x768.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-220x110.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/wordsesh-americas-helen-hou-sandi-160x80.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1760px) 100vw, 1760px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>WordSesh is a live, highly-curated, free virtual conference centered around WordPress. <a href="https://wordsesh.com/">WordSesh Americas 2020</a>, happening this Wednesday, May 27, includes 12 sessions that touch on topics like headless WordPress, client services, and communication skills.</p>
<p>I am excited to be a part of the lineup, sharing <strong>how developers can make the most of a development tool they are probably already using: Github</strong>.</p>
<p>Github is used by many developers to build and manage both public plugins and themes and private work. My session takes a closer look at <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2019/wordpress-github-actions-streamline-plugin-deployment/">GitHub Actions</a>, a newer feature to help with automation for repetitive tasks like testing and deployment. It will cover WordPress-specific Actions, tying multiple Actions together in a workflow, and ideas for how to continually improve development processes.</p>
<p><a href="https://wordsesh.com/">Register for free and join me!</a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23665 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-appearances category-around-the-web gutenbergs-create-block-scaffolding">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/gutenbergs-create-block-scaffolding/">Deep Dive: Gutenberg’s Create-block Scaffolding</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-fabian-kaegy" title="Posts by Fabian Kaegy" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/10up-Bio-Picture-Fabian-Kägy-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/10up-Bio-Picture-Fabian-Kägy-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Fabian Kaegy</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/gutenbergs-create-block-scaffolding/" title="Deep Dive: Gutenberg’s Create-block Scaffolding"><time datetime="2020-05-22T12:00:52-04:00">May 22, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion.jpg" alt="Fabian Kaegy on Gutenberg Times Live Live" width="1600" height="890" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23671" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-300x167.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-800x445.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-768x427.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-1536x854.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-220x122.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/create-block-discussion-160x90.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Yesterday, I was a guest on <a href="https://gutenbergtimes.com/">Gutenberg Times</a> Live, discussing the inner workings of the <a href="https://developer.wordpress.org/cli/commands/scaffold/block/">Create Block scaffolding tool</a> and the creation of new templates. The “WordPress/create-block” tool is a Command Line Application that facilitates the building and registering of new block plugins to help developers extend the capabilities of the WordPress block editor.</p>
<p>The discussion revolved around my pull request, <a href="https://github.com/WordPress/gutenberg/pull/22175">Create block: Add support for external templates hosted on npm</a>. I demonstrated how this proposed solution makes it easier to create new block templates.</p>
<p>You can <a href="https://youtu.be/NbrME0UlYbQ">watch the video</a> on the Gutenberg Times YouTube Channel.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23602 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings ads-txt-manager-supports-app-ads-txt">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ads-txt-manager-supports-app-ads-txt/">Ads.txt Manager 1.3 Now Supports App-Ads.txt</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jeff-paul" title="Posts by Jeff Paul" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Jeffrey Paul." src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JeffreyPaul_headshot-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/02/JeffreyPaul_headshot-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jeff Paul</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ads-txt-manager-supports-app-ads-txt/" title="Ads.txt Manager 1.3 Now Supports App-Ads.txt"><time datetime="2020-05-13T12:00:19-04:00">May 13, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p>In March 2019, the Interactive Advertising Bureau (IAB) finalized <a href="https://iabtechlab.com/blog/final-version-of-app-ads-txt-ready-for-adoption-to-fight-inventory-fraud-in-mobile-apps-and-ott/">app-ads.txt</a>, an extension of the original <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2017/ads-txt-manager-for-wordpress/">ads.txt standard</a> that provides publishers a mechanism to declare their authorized digital sellers. By August, Google <a href="https://www.blog.google/products/admob/app-ads-txt-protects-app-revenue-and-brand/">began blocking</a> the serving of unauthorized ad inventory based on app-ads.txt files.</p>
<p><strong>Today we’re happy to share that our WordPress plugin, Ads.txt Manager, now supports both ads.txt and app-ads.txt file types.</strong></p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt.png" alt="app-ads.txt WordPress screen" width="1600" height="1309" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23608" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-300x245.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-800x655.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-768x628.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-1536x1257.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-152x124.png 152w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/05/app-ads-txt-110x90.png 110w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/ads-txt-manager-supports-app-ads-txt/#more-23602" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Ads.txt Manager 1.3 Now Supports App-Ads.txt</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23461 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-happenings artificial-intelligence-machine-learning-whitepaper">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/artificial-intelligence-machine-learning-whitepaper/">Advancing Content Creation With Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning: A New Whitepaper From&nbsp;10up</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-phil-crumm" title="Posts by Phil Crumm" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/philcrumm-600x600-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2016/12/philcrumm-600x600-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Phil Crumm</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/artificial-intelligence-machine-learning-whitepaper/" title="Advancing Content Creation With Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning: A New Whitepaper From 10up"><time datetime="2020-05-07T12:00:37-04:00">May 7, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper.png" alt="Applications of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Digital Content Creators Whitepaper Cover" width="1600" height="500" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23473" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-300x94.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-800x250.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-768x240.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-1536x480.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-220x69.png 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/AIML-Whitepaper-160x50.png 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>Extensive <a href="https://10up.com/our-work/">experience</a> working with some of the world’s largest content creators has given 10up unique insight into the needs of digital publishers: increasing audience engagement, improving workflow efficiency, enhancing search engine performance, and growing revenue. As market challenges in digital publishing mount, parallel <strong>growth in artificial intelligence (AI) and machine learning (ML) technologies offer important opportunities</strong> for content creators that will only grow in importance in the future.</p>
<p>While still relatively new and not yet widely adopted within the publishing industry, AI and ML can already provide forward-thinking content creators a chance to get ahead of the competition.</p>
<p>Our new whitepaper, <strong>Applications of Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning for Digital Content Creators</strong> examines how AI and ML are spurring innovation in content management, personalization, and website experiences. It also highlights real world solutions — including <a href="https://classifaiplugin.com/">ClassifAI</a>, our plugin that augments WordPress-powered websites with AI/ML technology — that help digital content creators save time and streamline workflows.</p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/artificial-intelligence-machine-learning-whitepaper/#more-23461" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on Advancing Content Creation With Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning: A New Whitepaper From&nbsp;10up</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23482 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-around-the-web post_format-post-format-aside helen-hou-sandi-presenter-bang-bang-con">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-presenter-bang-bang-con/" title="Aside: Helen Hou-Sandi Presents At Bang Bang Con"><img alt="Helen Hou-Sandí" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/HHouSandi-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/05/HHouSandi-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/helen/" title="Posts by Helen Hou-Sandi" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Helen Hou-Sandi</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/helen-hou-sandi-presenter-bang-bang-con/" title="Aside: Helen Hou-Sandi Presents At Bang Bang Con"><time datetime="2020-05-04T12:30:46-04:00">May 4, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p><a href="http://bangbangcon.com/">!!Con 2020</a> (pronounced “bang bang con”) features two days of ten-minute talks celebrating the joyous, exciting, and surprising moments in computing. This pay-what-you-want conference is happening online May 9-10, 2020 and I am excited to share that I will be <a href="http://bangbangcon.com/program.html">speaking at 1:00 pm EST on Sunday, May 10</a>.</p>
<p>My talk, <a href="http://bangbangcon.com/speakers.html#helen-hou-sandi">Sparking Musical Joy at Home With Magnetic Stripe Swipe Cards and Tiny Code</a>, shares how I, a programmer and not a human jukebox, used a Raspberry Pi, magnetic stripe swipe cards, stickers, and a tiny Bash script to help my children enjoy curated music on their own terms.</p>
</div>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23509 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-projects storycorps-connect">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/storycorps-connect/">10up Helps Launch StoryCorps Connect</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jay-moore" title="Posts by Jay Moore" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/JayMoore_ProfilePic-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/01/JayMoore_ProfilePic-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Jay Moore</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/storycorps-connect/" title="10up Helps Launch StoryCorps Connect"><time datetime="2020-04-29T12:00:43-04:00">April 29, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p>In the midst of the COVID-19 pandemic, organizations across the globe have been forced to adapt and overcome unprecedented circumstances. One such organization is our long-term client StoryCorps who recently launched <a href="https://storycorps.org/participate/storycorps-connect/">StoryCorps Connect</a>, a new browser-based video conferencing platform engineered by 10up.</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect.png" alt="StoryCorps Connect" width="1600" height="1022" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23515" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect.png 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-300x192.png 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-800x511.png 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-768x491.png 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-1536x981.png 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-194x124.png 194w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/storycorps-connect-141x90.png 141w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>With a mission to preserve and share humanity’s stories, StoryCorps has collected living histories of more than 300,000 Americans. Stored at the American Folklife Center at the Library of Congress, the StoryCorps archive is the largest conglomerate of human voice in the world. </p>
<p>To date, the stories have been gathered through live, in-person interviews facilitated by StoryCorps moderators and recorded with their mobile app. However, under orders to <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/adjusting-to-remote-work/">stay at home</a> and practice social distancing, the interviews came to a screeching halt. </p>
<p> <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/storycorps-connect/#more-23509" class="more-link">Read More <span class="screen-reader-text">on 10up Helps Launch StoryCorps Connect</span></a></p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23380 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web 10up-recommends-ux-research-tools-adobe-xd-ideas-blog">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/10up-recommends-ux-research-tools-adobe-xd-ideas-blog/">10up Recommends UX Research Tools On Adobe’s Xd Ideas&nbsp;Blog</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/chriswallace/" title="Posts by Chris Wallace" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Chris-Wallace_avatar_1510758076-64x64.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2017/11/Chris-Wallace_avatar_1510758076-128x128.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Chris Wallace</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/10up-recommends-ux-research-tools-adobe-xd-ideas-blog/" title="10up Recommends UX Research Tools On Adobe’s Xd Ideas Blog"><time datetime="2020-04-15T12:00:05-04:00">April 15, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools.jpg" alt="Effective UX Research Tools" width="1600" height="560" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23386" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-300x105.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-800x280.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-768x269.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-1536x538.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-220x77.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/effective-ux-research-tools-160x56.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>User experience research involves evaluating and capturing user behavior and interactions, and requires interactive collaboration and prototyping with participants and stakeholders. With remote work on the rise, leading UX researchers have adopted a new generation of tools that facilitate this research and collaboration without the need for in person interaction.</p>
<p>In the article <a href="https://xd.adobe.com/ideas/process/user-research/best-ux-research-tools/">5 Effective UX Research Tools That the Experts Use</a>, Adobe asked professional UX researchers and designers — including 10up’s own lead UX designers Ben Grace and Melissa Vander Wilt — to spotlight their user UX research tools of choice. </p>
<p>Ben shares how 10up leverages digital whiteboard and remote team collaboration software <a href="https://miro.com/">Miro</a> to plan and prep for research, keep the team organized, and socialize findings.</p>
<p>Melissa highlights 10up’s use of <a href="https://www.hotjar.com/">Hotjar</a> to perform user testing and behavior analysis, run surveys and polls, and gather insights for ongoing optimization. </p>
<p>If you’d like to do your next design and UX project with a team that knows how to achieve excellence without needing to be in the office, <a href="https://10up.com/contact/">get in touch</a>.</p>
</div>
</article>
<article class="blog-archive-post post-23362 type-post status-publish format-standard hentry category-around-the-web category-happenings optimize-work-from-home-experience">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/optimize-work-from-home-experience/">Optimize Your Work From Home Experience</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/author/christinegarrison/" title="Posts by Christine Garrison" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="" src="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a54756b4e907df4d47a780bfc76c5a36?s=64&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg" srcset="https://secure.gravatar.com/avatar/a54756b4e907df4d47a780bfc76c5a36?s=128&amp;d=mm&amp;r=pg 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> Christine Garrison</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/optimize-work-from-home-experience/" title="Optimize Your Work From Home Experience"><time datetime="2020-04-10T13:02:01-04:00">April 10, 2020</time></a>
•
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/optimize-work-from-home-experience/#comments" class="comments-count">1 Comment</a>
</p>
<p><img decoding="async" loading="lazy" src="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar.jpg" alt="Kinsta Work From Home Webinar" width="1600" height="560" class="aligncenter size-full wp-image-23368" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar.jpg 1600w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-300x105.jpg 300w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-800x280.jpg 800w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-768x269.jpg 768w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-1536x538.jpg 1536w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-220x77.jpg 220w, https://10up.com/uploads/2020/04/kinsta-work-from-home-webinar-160x56.jpg 160w" sizes="(max-width: 1600px) 100vw, 1600px" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></p>
<p>10up is joining forces with Kinsta for a free webinar focused on optimizing the work from home experience. Featured on the webinar will be our own Brad Miller, a Vice President who has worked from home for several years.</p>
<p>Happening on April 15 at 12:30 pm Eastern time, the webinar will cover:</p>
<ul>
<li>Tips for setting up an at-home workspace</li>
<li>Ways to eliminate distractions</li>
<li>How to create opportunities to casually connect with colleagues (and talk about something other than work)</li>
<li>How to prioritize time effectively</li>
<li>Insights on finding work-life balance when work and home are the same place</li>
</ul>
<p><a href="https://get.kinsta.com/remote-work-101-webinar">Learn more and register to save your spot</a>!</p>
</div>
</article>

<h1><a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/congratulations-tim-wright/">Congratulations Tim&nbsp;Wright!</a></h1>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-john-eckman" title="Posts by John Eckman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"><img alt="John Eckman" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/jeckman-64x64.png" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2019/11/jeckman-128x128.png 2x" class="avatar avatar-64 photo" height="64" width="64" loading="lazy" decoding="async"> John Eckman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/congratulations-tim-wright/" title="Congratulations Tim Wright!"><time datetime="2020-04-08T10:10:30-04:00">April 8, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<p>I was excited (but not surprised) to see Tim Wright featured this week as Smashing Magazine’s “Person of the Week.” In his role as Director of Front End Engineering, we’ve had first-hand experience with his commitment to knowledge sharing and mentoring, especially with respect to web accessibility.</p>
<blockquote class="twitter-tweet" data-width="550" data-dnt="true">
<p lang="en" dir="ltr">He has done every job from designing and coding to directing teams, and he loves to give back to the community — please meet our Person of the Week: Tim Wright.</p>
<p>Thank you for sharing and caring, dear <a href="https://twitter.com/iamtimwright?ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">@iamtimwright</a>!<a href="https://twitter.com/hashtag/smashingcommunity?src=hash&amp;ref_src=twsrc%5Etfw">#smashingcommunity</a> <a href="https://t.co/VfJWE9lvlU">pic.twitter.com/VfJWE9lvlU</a></p>

<p>Congrats Tim, and well deserved!</p>

<article class="blog-archive-post post-23284 type-post status-publish format-aside hentry category-appearances category-around-the-web post_format-post-format-aside work-from-home">
<div class="blog-archive-post-content">
<a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/work-from-home/" title="Work From Home"><img alt="Avatar photo" src="./Blog _ 10up_files/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-256x256.jpg" srcset="https://10up.com/uploads/2014/09/Jake-Goldman_avatar_1410997004-512x512.jpg 2x" class="avatar avatar-256 photo" height="256" width="256" loading="lazy" decoding="async" data-xblocker="passed" style="visibility: visible;"></a>
<p class="author byline">
<a href="https://10up.com/about/#employee-jake-goldman" title="Posts by Jake Goldman" rel="author" class="author-posts-link"> Jake Goldman</a> on <a href="https://10up.com/blog/2020/work-from-home/" title="Work From Home"><time datetime="2020-04-06T15:31:56-04:00">April 6, 2020</time></a>
</p>
<div class="body-copy">
<p>In response to COVID-19, many people are working from home for the first time. Recently, I shared insights from my experience working at home and leading a remote agency with one of our clients, T-Mobile. My tips are featured alongside some other perspectives in their story, <a href="https://www.t-mobile.com/news/7-pro-tips-to-make-working-from-home-work">Pants or No Pants? That Is the Question!</a> For the record, I am team “yes, pants.”</p>
